As a fan, this is probably the best, most high tech we've used.Design and ergonomics are great, air movement is powerful and, importantly to us, there's no open blade to stick things in or whack fingers on when the guard falls off (which has happened to us, with other cheap-o fans we used).It's is a lot bigger than we expected (see a picture next to our tall 7-year old), which really helps it to blow air around even large rooms.However, it is also only the diameter of a small plate, so it's ideal for tight spaces where a traditional, propeller type fans would knock into surrounding objects as it oscillates.It even comes with a remote that fits discretely into a small slot in the back of the fan, so it's ideal for spaces where you want to sit down and get things blowing from across the room.Some of the more exotic blower modes were a little weird for us (it's supposed to simulate a sporadic, natural breeze that changes in intensity randomly), so we just used the constant-blower mode. Even with that, however, it's great that the fan is so energy-efficent!All in all, this is an easy fan to recommend! It will likely be the next fan we look to for our next purchase as well.

I received one of these pillows to try out and was immediately taken aback by an extremely strong odor that I assume is fire retardant, but smelled similar to the kind of rot when you find a decaying mouse in a trap after it sat out for a month.It is SERIOUSLY bad.We tried to air the pillow out for a few days, but that helped only minimally, and we also tried to see if we could wash it, but apparently you're not supposed to. The instructions in the pillow case say you should only spot clean or machine wash the pillowcase, not the pillow.Apparently this product comes with a 5-year warranty, but when we contacted Classic Brands (whose contact information we had to search for, since it didn't appear to be included anywhere in the package), they said they were only the manufacturer and that we'd have to go through the distributor for a replacement. Thus, I wouldn't be surprised if warranty replacement is a pain.I may have gotten a bad sample or something, as others seem satisfied, but we're throwing this pillow away because of the stench. It is FOUL!

I noticed the driver's side door window's bottom moulding was tearing on my 2007 Prius, so I investigated how easy of a fix it was and how much the part was.A local dealership wanted to charge $70 for this part, but I found it on Amazon for almost half that price!A diagram of how to change the moulding can be found on PriusChat.com if you use your Google Fu, but it basically involves lifting the moulding up near the rear of the door which is a bit hard, because it's sort of attached to the door metal with a little plastic clip. I had to use a flathead screwdriver for leverage.After you get the end off, you lift the moulding out of the door frame then slide it toward the rear of the vehicle an inch or two in order to clear the slot it fits in in front.After that, you slide the new one in and attach it to the door from front to back (where the little plastic clip is).It's a fairly easy self repair.

We got a PS4 for Christmas and 4 controllers.We bought this charger at a Black Friday sale and the Sony charger at another, and I ended up throwing the Sony charger out in favor of another one of these!The big advantage with the Nyko charger is that it has an attachment that fits into the controller's USB port that has charging contacts on the end. This enables you to simply set the controllers on the charger, then effortlessly lift off when you're ready to play again.The design is simple, elegant and brilliant.By contrast, the Sony charger not only makes you plug directly into the USB port (which is a relative hassle), but it has parts that pop out when you try to detach the controller and it took my kids about two weeks to lose one and make 1/2 the charger worthless.I digress.THIS is the charger you want for PS4 controllers. It's hands down the best design I've seen for ANY controller chargers!

EDIT: *** Intuit recently announced that they're caving and just offering every returning Deluxe customer a free upgrade, then reintroducing the old included features for next year. However, the deal isn't active as of the date of this edit. H&R Block has also offered to give you their competing software for FREE with proof of TurboTax Deluxe purchase. Google "SwitchToBlock" for detail. ***Many people are (understandably) upset that Intuit removed features from Deluxe for certain schedule C and D filers. I agree that was a bad move, but in Intuit's defense, they offer a $25 refund for a $30 upgrade to Premium for Deluxe buyers who used Deluxe last year if you call 800-445-1875 and explain your situation.Also, it's a better deal than people are giving it credit for, plus support is America-based and actually pretty helpful (I'll explain my experience with them below).At present, the Deluxe with Fed + State is $38, BUT you're eligible to receive a 10% bonus on every $100 you apply to an Amazon gift card (up to $10,000 of gift cards). That means that if you shop on Amazon a lot, or want to buy a TV with your refund or something, then all you have to do is use $400 of your refund on Amazon gift cards and this software pays for itself.Many are suggesting switching to H&R Block Tax Cut, but just be aware that they don't have the same deal with Amazon gift cards so there may be a financial trade-off with the decision if you're a frequent Amazon shopper. That said, H&R Block DOES have a 10% gift card bonus program for 40 vendors like Target and Best Buy, so they're still a good alternative to consider if you frequent H&R Block's participating stores.As far as TurboTax support goes, they were great to me!I accidentally bought the version of this without state (big mistake on my part because Intuit will normally charge you $40 to buy the a la carte state download). At first I was frustrated because I didn't realize what I was buying (or that they even made a version without state), but:1. They apparently have a 60-day money back guarantee where they'll send you a refund if you send them your purchase confirmation.-and-2. I thought that would be a pain because of all the bureaucracy, delay and snail-mail involved, so I called support and they were nice enough to let me buy my state for only $9, which was the price difference between what I mistakenly bought and what I meant to buy.In short, I understand many reviewers' frustration, but it seems like Intuit really is trying to take care of their customers, so I thought I'd try to give them a little love in light of all the negative reviews.

I have five kids aged 2-7 and found that this game is well-suited to my younger kiddos.The games revolve around sorting by size, counting, basic measuing by "ruler", dragging lines to make basic shapes and more.The games are definitely geared toward younger learners. The recommended age is 3-5, but you might get away with a bit younger, and the higher end of that age range would be pushing it.One of the games, for example, gets kids to pick which of three options is a number versus a letter. Others have you tracing lines to draw the number. Those skills in particular are aimed at very young kiddos.Not to say that's bad; just know what you're getting into by buying this. I thought it was great for my 2 and 3 year old and would definitely recommend it for anyone in that age range!

This was our first LeapTV game and we loved it!All our five kids (ages 2-7) were cracking up and jumping around as they played events that had them "climbing" ropes by pantomiming a climbing motion in front of the camera and moving their bodies around to play goalie and block soccer balls.Most games are set up such that you have a fun "game" activity split every 30 seconds or so by a few quick math or pattern matching problem which, when solved correctly, either improve your score or allow you to move to the next section.The setup is fun, and kids are motivated to think and answer the questions quickly in order to move on.It doesn't ever feel boring, the educational portions go out of their way not to discourage kids if they get the answer wrong, and the difficult adjusts to fit the age of the child playing!It's VERY well designed!The only con to mention is that there are a couple "Sports" that don't necessarily encourage kids to be active. Case in point, my kids' favorite event is the skateboarding game, which only requires you to sit and use the controller to navigate around the ramps and rails, thus they aren't getting any exercise out of it.Still highly recommended!

This thing is basically like a bada** squirt gun for adults that you fill up with water, plug in for a few minutes, then use to unleash your wrath on unsuspecting messes!We have five kids aged 7 and under so believe me when I say our house often looks like the aftermath of a hurricane, but with bits of peanut butter and strawberries stuck/dried in odd places all over our floors.We used to curse and go to town with a washcloth and elbow grease, but now we just reach for this thing and shoot it off!It's easier. It's faster. It's gun shaped.Go ahead, messes. Make my day!

Before my last set of wiper blades, I used to use bracketed designs, which have straight sections split by hinges at multiple points. The drawback is that when something gets bent a little out of shape or hits a bump mid-wipe, then a whole section's wiping performance is compromised.Bracketless designs, on the other hand, are like big, spring-loaded bananas, where the whole thing tries to curve in on itself. The advantage here is that you have a nice, even wipe with no bare spots.The Insight is a great, bracketless blade that I installed alongside a different, year-old blade. The performance was strong, and immediately noticeable in the Colorado snow.My old wiper (also a Bosch bracketless) has held up great, but is finally starting to decline in performance, leaving slight streaks when trying to use the windshield washer fluid to clean off dirt.I have no doubt the Insight will last just as long!Oh, and I got one of these for free to review, but I liked it so much I bought a second to replace its older cousin.Great wiper blade!

In our house, our world increasingly centers around our phone. We open our Kevo deadbolt via phone, control our front porch and living room lights via WeMo on our phone, use remote apps to control A/V equipment, etc.It makes sense; phones are extremely powerful tools that are invaluable enough to keep glued to our hips at all times.Thus, when iDevices came out with the phone-enabled thermometer, we were intrigued and excited when we got a chance to try it over Christmas dinner!Fortunately, it performed fantastically!My non-technical wife got it easily up-and-running without my help simply by downloading the app and having it walk her through setup.Once that's done, you can put the dual probes in whatever you're cooking, then walk away to attend to kids, guests, or other cooking tasks while waiting for an alert from the app. It's SO easy and much more convenient than either checking on the thermometer constantly, or keeping a separate device for the purpose.Also, because it's all tied together with a smartphone app, you have bells and whistles like charting and phone based alerts!The only negative we can say about it is that we found it inconvenient to perfectly coil the probe cords (we could never quite get them to fit right), so we just ended up throwing the probes and LCD unit into a freezer bag for storage when not in use.Definitely a great buy!

We have a big enough house, but we also have a family of seven, so counter space is at a premium in our home and we love that this dish rack is designed to fold relatively flat to be easily tucked away.We found that there was ample space, tines and racks enough to hold everything from glassware to one or two larger pots. Better yet is how various components fold away individually to add to the versatility.The rack seems well constructed and easy to use (as most OXO products are).It's only slightly smaller than others we've used, but we consider it the "right" size for our needs and limited space.

I have leather car and theater seats and decided to give this set a whirl on both.Having the set was nice, because it let me try out and decide what I liked best (and if I liked it at all).Overall, I did and here's my impression:1. The air freshener: smells like leather, but more the type of leather you smell walking into a cowboy boot store rather than a "new car" leather kind of smell.2. The cleaner: works decently. I'm going to use it to spot clean my theater seats.3. The conditioner: a sort of lotion that smells the same way the air freshener does (like a cowboy boot store). I'll probably use it for my car seats since the smell doesn't seem to linger overly long after application and it seems to be a better conditioner than the spray stuff. About enough to cover two car seats.4. The cleaner/conditioner spray: probably my least favorite since it feels a bit liquidy to provide any sort of long-lived protection (though maybe that's just a misimpression).A great sampler kit to decide for yourself!

We got this for our teenage nephew who likes horror ambiance. I am very pleased with the result!It's genuinely frightening, much more so than the half-scary Monster High-type toys you find at big chain toy stores.One thing to note is that this doll just comes in a clear plastic bag, not the coffin box like some Living Dead Dolls do. See my pic for the actual packaging/real life view of the doll.

I love my wife, but she sheds like a dog and every time she showers, we pretty much have to use our fingernails to claw out the nasty hairball that is partway down the drain, clogging the tub.The OXO Drain Protector helps make the process less urgent and a bit less gross: the drain never clogs with this cover over it (though the lower holes can get dammed up and still let the lower tub fill up a bit) and we can let more hair accumulate before we HAVE to take care of the problem.Cleaning is easy, too. The trapped hair and lint usually lift off when you pick up the Drain Protector, so you just move it to the trash and quickly scrape it off.We love it!

I just got a set of four of these delivered and wanted to give some unfiltered insight on the chairs (since some of the online retailers selling the seats pick-and-choose which reviews get published).Here are my initial impressions...The Good*ATTRACTIVE- Like similar models (Lane Matinee, Octane Turbo, etc.) these are seemingly based off of the old Berkline 12003 Reno (which are also beautiful seats).*LARGE- I'm 6'2, 210 lbs. and can easily rest my head against the back of the top of the chair. The back frame of the seat is 36", the head padding extends to 42" (not 45" like some documentation claims) and 30" from seat bottom to headrest top. The bottom of my butt to the tip of my head is around 37" tall (give or take) and it feels like there is a little bit of headrest room to spare once I sink into the chair both sitting and reclining.*GROMMET AND TRAY TABLES STANDARD! - It's awesome that the tray is integrated into the chair, since you can be reclined and still eat off of it (unlike having to sit up to place a TV tray in front of the chair).*GOOD RANGE OF OPTIONS (Depending on Retailer) - Brown/black colors. Loveseat/couch options. Power/manual recline. Bonded leather (leather scraps and glue) in the entry level, but some places sell it in more durable top grain leather. Good range of grommet accessories like wine glass caddies, tablet holders, cigar host, reading light, etc.* WALL-HUGGER RECLINE - You can set the upright seat a few inches from the wall and it will recline almost to the point you're lying down without hitting the back of the wall.*USB POWER RECLINE SWITCH - Some vendors offer a lighted two-port USB charger integrated into the power recline switch, which is nice for charging a tablet/phone while sitting. On the downside, the light doesn't turn off.The Bad*LOVESEAT CONFIGURATIONS HAVE AWKWARD POWER RECLINE CONTROLS - You'd think that all power recline controls would be on the armrests, but the recline control for one seat of loveseat configurations is actually a lever on the right side of the chair.*LIGHT ENOUGH TO TIP OVER - While the version of the seat with two armrests is something like 150 lbs., other configurations (esp. the armless version of seat used in loveseat/couch configurations) are much lighter and ALL of them have a tendency to tip forward while leaving/entering the seat if you leave the footrest extended. This could be mitigated if the chairs were connected, but...*THE CHAIRS DON'T ATTACH TO EACH OTHER - If you buy a row of four, what you get is a standalone seat with two armrests and three other standalone seats that only have a right armrest. This isn't a huge deal, but it makes them more prone to tipping, as mentioned. I've been told you can buy connecting brackets separately, however.*LED UNDERLIGHTING IS OBNOXIOUSLY BRIGHT - In fact, if you leave the lights on and have the seatrest up, a blue glow will be projected onto the wall/screen/TV in front of you (extending to about 6' high). Some owners either leave the lights off entirely, or cover them up with electric tape or window tinting.*GROMMETS SCRATCH EASILY - All mine were scratched within the first few days under normal use.*IN-ARM STORAGE REALLY ONLY HOLDS TRAY (at least with straight row configurations) - You'll pretty much be using the in-arm storage for the included tray. It can't fit two, and you'd be at risk of damaging fragile remotes/tablets with the tray if you tried to put them in the same compartment.*I PREFER THICKER FOOTREST PADDING - There's only about an inch of padding between your legs and the board beneath. It would be more comfortable if it were thicker.*LED LIGHTING POWER SUPPLY FAILED ON SECOND DAY - This may be a fluke, but I had one of the LED lighting power supplies go out on me very quickly. The vendor is sending a new one, however.Overall, I'm decently happy with them so far. I got talked out of other seats like the Rialto (which had a seat height that would have left my head hanging over the edge), so I'm satisfied that these are not bargain-basement chairs. However, I suspect that some of the negatives I mentioned wouldn't be characteristic of more expensive chairs from other manufacturers.For me, these hit a sweet spot and I look forward to getting years of use out of them! Recommended, but not so much that I'd totally discount competing chairs.

This isn't a huge deal, but it makes them more prone to tipping, as mentioned. I've been told you can buy connecting brackets separately, however.*LED UNDERLIGHTING IS OBNOXIOUSLY BRIGHT - In fact, if you leave the lights on and have the seatrest up, a blue glow will be projected onto the wall/screen/TV in front of you (extending to about 6' high). Some owners either leave the lights off entirely, or cover them up with electric tape or window tinting.*GROMMETS SCRATCH EASILY - All mine were scratched within the first few days under normal use.*IN-ARM STORAGE REALLY ONLY HOLDS TRAY (at least with straight row configurations) - You'll pretty much be using the in-arm storage for the included tray. It can't fit two, and you'd be at risk of damaging fragile remotes/tablets with the tray if you tried to put them in the same compartment.*I PREFER THICKER FOOTREST PADDING - There's only about an inch of padding between your legs and the board beneath. It would be more comfortable if it were thicker.*LED LIGHTING POWER SUPPLY FAILED ON SECOND DAY - This may be a fluke, but I had one of the LED lighting power supplies go out on me very quickly. The vendor is sending a new one, however.Overall, I'm decently happy with them so far. I got talked out of other seats like the Rialto (which had a seat height that would have left my head hanging over the edge), so I'm satisfied that these are not bargain-basement chairs. However, I suspect that some of the negatives I mentioned wouldn't be characteristic of more expensive chairs from other manufacturers.For me, these hit a sweet spot and I look forward to getting years of use out of them! Recommended, but not so much that I'd totally discount competing chairs.

I just got a set of four of these delivered and wanted to give some unfiltered insight on the chairs (since some of the online retailers selling the seats pick-and-choose which reviews get published).Here are my initial impressions...The Good*ATTRACTIVE- Like similar models (Lane Matinee, Octane Turbo, etc.) these are seemingly based off of the old Berkline 12003 Reno (which are also beautiful seats).*LARGE- I'm 6'2, 210 lbs. and can easily rest my head against the back of the top of the chair. The back frame of the seat is 36", the head padding extends to 42" (not 45" like some documentation claims) and 30" from seat bottom to headrest top. The bottom of my butt to the tip of my head is around 37" tall (give or take) and it feels like there is a little bit of headrest room to spare once I sink into the chair both sitting and reclining.*GROMMET AND TRAY TABLES STANDARD! - It's awesome that the tray is integrated into the chair, since you can be reclined and still eat off of it (unlike having to sit up to place a TV tray in front of the chair).*GOOD RANGE OF OPTIONS (Depending on Retailer) - Brown/black colors. Loveseat/couch options. Power/manual recline. Bonded leather (leather scraps and glue) in the entry level, but some places sell it in more durable top grain leather. Good range of grommet accessories like wine glass caddies, tablet holders, cigar host, reading light, etc.* WALL-HUGGER RECLINE - You can set the upright seat a few inches from the wall and it will recline almost to the point you're lying down without hitting the back of the wall.*USB POWER RECLINE SWITCH - Some vendors offer a lighted two-port USB charger integrated into the power recline switch, which is nice for charging a tablet/phone while sitting. On the downside, the light doesn't turn off.The Bad*LOVESEAT CONFIGURATIONS HAVE AWKWARD POWER RECLINE CONTROLS - You'd think that all power recline controls would be on the armrests, but the recline control for one seat of loveseat configurations is actually a lever on the right side of the chair.*LIGHT ENOUGH TO TIP OVER - While the version of the seat with two armrests is something like 150 lbs., other configurations (esp. the armless version of seat used in loveseat/couch configurations) are much lighter and ALL of them have a tendency to tip forward while leaving/entering the seat if you leave the footrest extended. This could be mitigated if the chairs were connected, but...*THE CHAIRS DON'T ATTACH TO EACH OTHER - If you buy a row of four, what you get is a standalone seat with two armrests and three other standalone seats that only have a right armrest. This isn't a huge deal, but it makes them more prone to tipping, as mentioned. I've been told you can buy connecting brackets separately, however.*LED UNDERLIGHTING IS OBNOXIOUSLY BRIGHT - In fact, if you leave the lights on and have the seatrest up, a blue glow will be projected onto the wall/screen/TV in front of you (extending to about 6' high). Some owners either leave the lights off entirely, or cover them up with electric tape or window tinting.*GROMMETS SCRATCH EASILY - All mine were scratched within the first few days under normal use.*IN-ARM STORAGE REALLY ONLY HOLDS TRAY (at least with straight row configurations) - You'll pretty much be using the in-arm storage for the included tray. It can't fit two, and you'd be at risk of damaging fragile remotes/tablets with the tray if you tried to put them in the same compartment.*I PREFER THICKER FOOTREST PADDING - There's only about an inch of padding between your legs and the board beneath. It would be more comfortable if it were thicker.*LED LIGHTING POWER SUPPLY FAILED ON SECOND DAY - This may be a fluke, but I had one of the LED lighting power supplies go out on me very quickly. The vendor is sending a new one, however.Overall, I'm decently happy with them so far. I got talked out of other seats like the Rialto (which had a seat height that would have left my head hanging over the edge), so I'm satisfied that these are not bargain-basement chairs. However, I suspect that some of the negatives I mentioned wouldn't be characteristic of more expensive chairs from other manufacturers.For me, these hit a sweet spot and I look forward to getting years of use out of them! Recommended, but not so much that I'd totally discount competing chairs.

There's not much to say about this stuffed giraffe aside from my daughter loved it, and the seller doing an excellent job of describing exactly what you're getting: a 12" tall stuffed giraffe that looks exactly like the picture.If you're looking for something like this, don't hesitate to buy it. What you see is what you get in this case, which is a good thing.

One of the biggest reasons to consider this receiver is if you want the awesome sound quality and easy setup of a Pioneer Elite receiver, but don't want to break the bank on a $1000-3000 receiver (like the other Elites) and also plan on upgrading to a 4K TV now or in the future.For the present, the VSX-80 has the ability to offer 4K upscaling from a 1080p source to make your existing content look even better. For the future, the VSX-80 also offers 4K passthrough, which will become important within about a year's time, as the Blu-ray Disc Association announced 4K discs coming around late 2015.Notably, the VSX-80's 4K support is via HDMI 2.0, which may sound meaningless, but is a vital differentiator between this and older "4K" receivers. Case in point, this receiver replaces an Onkyo TX-NR727 for me, and while my old Onkyo receiver claimed 4K support, it did so via dual HDMI outputs, which is an approach the A/V industry is abandoning in favor of HDMI 2.0 (which is basically 4k video at 60fps through a single HDMI cord).Thus, with the VSX-80, you're getting a receiver that the respected review website Audioholics.com describes as "about as future proof as you're going to get".Setup is also a breeze, and is one of Pioneer receiver's other big strengths. To calibrate your system you connect all your speakers, then take the included long-corded microphone and place it near your planned listening area. The receiver then runs through a quick series of tests to equalize volume and compensate for speaker distances. Afterwards, the result is pretty incredible!My first exposure to the post-calibration sound quality was streaming music from my iPhone via AirPlay, and it was jaw-droppingly good. I noticed detail in the vocals and instruments that I'd never heard before! It's hard to explain, but the top-notch calibration left me with the sensation that the output of every speaker hit my eardrums at JUST the right time, giving me the sensation that the musicians were right there in the room with me. It was a joy!Movie listening was also enjoyable, and seemed on par with my old Onkyo TX-NR727 in terms of audio quality, but the VSX-80's seemingly superior calibration made the surround effects seem more immersive. I used a few reference scenes from Avatar (like where a helicopter lands and monkey-like animals swung through the forest and howled all around) and it felt 3D enough to bring a smile to my face.Regarding power, I saw another reviewer complain that the output was too weak, but I was able to crank the volume up to the point where it was borderline uncomfortable for my ears and it wasn't even maxed out. It may not be able to power concert-sized speakers, but I think the power output will fit most customer's needs. For reference, I have a standalone subwoofer and a set of in-wall speakers for front and rear surround.The other thing I loved was the dual HDMI outputs that supported both audio AND video! I have a TV and a projector in the same area, so this feature was huge for me! My old receiver only supported audio in the second zone, so I had to buy a (sometimes malfunctioning) $70 HDMI splitter to send a video signal to both pieces of equipment. With the Elite VSX-80, I just plugged both in to the two outputs, set the receiver to output to both zones simultaneously and I am able to turn on either the TV or the projector at any time and get a full experience! Nice!As for the drawbacks, the worst I can say is this:1. Although Harmony remotes support the majority of VSX-80 functions, some of the more advanced ones (like output selection) have to be manually programmed. This is more an issue with Harmony remotes than the receiver itself, but it's worth mentioning.2. Some of the more advanced configuration isn't 100% intuitive. For instance, it took me a bit of research to determine that HDZone has to be disabled on Zone 1 to support outputting to Zone 2 (and even then, certain settings will block output to Zone 2 for some reason).3. I've occasionally noticed a few bugs. For instance, when switching from my projector to my TV, the video looked greenish. I simply turned the receiver on and off and everything was back to normal, however.4. One of the HDMI inputs is on the front of the receiver, which I've always found silly, but isn't a big deal for me since the six inputs on the back more than meet my needs.That's pretty much it! I love the receiver and would highly recommend it if you're looking for 4K compatibility, excellent audio, dual zone output and an excellent feature set, all at a reasonable price!

We tried this out and ended up thinking it was pretty neat!The playset comes with three models: a shark, spider and truck, all of which have many pieces that you can add skins to, then manually snap together.The "Skinz" are basically like large temporary tattoos; you wrap one around the part (or object) you're trying to skin, wrap the included sponge around the part (after getting it wet), then letting the vacuum suck out all the air until it's more or less form-fitting.Let sit for 10 seconds, peel off backing, straighten a little bit with the included brush (or just your fingers), and you've got yourself a pretty cool looking skin!My kids loved it, and so do I! The only bad part is that the three included models don't last long, and you can't currently buy replacement models as far as I can tell. This means you're either re-skinning the three models or finding something else small to use the skins on.Cool way to talk to your kids about what a vacuum is, too!

Our main concern with this $7 toy is that it would be DOA.It wasn't and, in fact, the gun has held up decently well over several months (to the point where it still makes sound and lights up when you pull the trigger).We did drop it a few times, which ended up breaking an internal piece such that the lights don't spin around any more, but you can only expect so much from such a cheap toy.

When it comes to workout supplements, my rule of thumb is this: if I feel or notice a difference after taking it, I'll use it. Otherwise, I think it's a waste of money.So ultimately, the answer to the question of if I feel a difference after taking this is: yes. My energy levels pick up with this and I feel more awake/alert.I disagree with the vendor that it is "lasting" energy, as the effect wears off on me after about an hour of workout time, but that's on par with other pre-workout supplements I've used (for lasting stamina, I'll use diet and cordyceps mushroom-based supplements like Cordygen).However, unlike most other pre-workout supplements I've used (like BSN N.O.-XPLODE), Vega Energizer uses Stevia as a sweetener versus artificial sweeteners like Sucrolose! This is big for me, as I feel more comfortable putting plant extracts into my body vs. a sweetener that was created in a lab.Vega Energizer is also not much more expensive than the N.O. XPLODE product I currently use (at least when you purchase it in a tub form). I crunched the numbers, and at current Amazon prices, it breaks down about like this:N.O. XPLODE  .73c/serving  $9.24/month assuming three workouts per weekVega Energizer  .85c/serving  $10.71/month assuming three workouts per weekSo the question is if it's worth spending an extra buck fifty a month to have a somewhat more natural, but still effective pre-workout supplement. For me, the answer is probably yes, and I anticipate making a permanent switch once my current supply of alternatives is exhausted.I like this product.

We started using these during the day with a three-year old who we've yet to potty train.The first time he put them on, a few minutes later he came up to me with a disgusted look on his face saying "I'm poopy", which I discovered was his way of saying that he felt wet.However, the diaper didn't leak at all, so we gave him a quick change and it was off to the races.In short, these work as advertised and we look forward to them being an effective weapon in our potty training arsenal!Oh, and it doesn't hurt that our boy LOVES Jake and the Neverland Pirates, who are printed on every other training pant.Good stuff!

Belkin typically does a great job with design, and you'd swear by the packaging and simplicity that they're something from out of the mind of Jonny Ive.This mount is (mostly) an example of this. It basically comes in a single piece, unless you count a removable cable management ring.A rubberized clamp slides into and pinches a vent, there's a spring-loaded foam-lined pincher arm to hold your phone, and it clicks into whatever rotational position you care for.On the downside, the holder arm seems big enough to secure a naked iPhone 6 Plus, but it's BARELY too narrow if you have it in a thick case like a Griffen Survivor (as I do).Also, USB cables tend to slip out of the holder ring, but are easily reconnected, so it's not a big deal.In a nutshell, this is a great mount for a normal sized phone and even a phablet minus a case.

My 3-year old son wanted to be a Ghostbuster for Halloween, and we got him this costume.For the most part, it's great, and has even been a fun toy for him in the days leading up to the big day.However, one thing to note is that it appears that they package the same sized proton pack with the adult costume that they do with the kids, so the proton pack is almost as big as my son (and has a tendency to slip off because the shoulder straps are too wide).He loves it, nonetheless.

I gave these a whirl for our bathroom given how inexpensive they were, and ended up buying more for our other bathrooms.Light is slightly warm/orange, though a tad less than your typical incandescent, it's the perfect brightness and light distribution is very even.However, I found that there was actually about a one second delay before the lights turned themselves on, which is only slightly annoying in one bathroom since a separate light bulb comes on first.The annoyance, however, is minor, and I'd easily purchase more if I hadn't already filled all my bathroom light sockets with them.

The big question I have with earbuds like this is, "How much better are they than the free pair I get with my phone". The answer is: noticeably; enough that my wife mentioned a difference in clarity versus stock Apple earbuds (and she's usually the type not to pick up on such things). They're more mid-range than high-end (as you'd expect at this price), but are good enough that they are a worthy replacement based on audio quality alone. Details are crisp and music is generally enjoyable.Equally noteworthy, is that the SoundTrue In-Ears are also much more comfortable than run-of-the-mill earbuds, despite having protruding rubber pieces that look like they're going to probe your eardrums. The rubberized earpiece actually distributes pressure throughout the ear quite nicely, which is a big deal for ME since ear buds have a tendency to irritate my ears after a short amount of time.The main caveat is that these earbuds don't have volume controls or any sort of microphone built in to the cord, though there are more expensive versions that do for:iPhone - Bose SoundTrue In-Ear Headphones for iOS Models, BlackAndroid (Galaxy) - Bose SoundTrue In-Ear Headphones for Samsung Galaxy Models, BlackPersonally, I'd recommend going for THOSE if you were going to buy these earbuds, but I'd recommend the Bose SoundTrue either way.
This hose was identical to the OEM hose it replaced.
This is an OEM direct replacement for the cable that came with the Samsung S5.

Don't waste your money unless you plan to use for light use (e.g. cake batter). Mine seemed to struggle with almost everything I used it for and died after just a few months while making mashed potatoes. I have a Kitchenaid mixer now and much happier.Update April 17 2015:I called HB customer support to get this mixer replaced under warranty. I thought it might be nice to have a mixer around for light use and of course, I paid for a product that failed during the warranty period. HB was happy to replace it but wanted to charge half the price I paid to ship it to me.
I love this flash drive. I've broken several other types that I placed on my key-chain losing everything stored on them. This drive stands up to everything I throw at it and it does it with style.

I have owned this for less than a month and am impressed with how well it works. It has changed how I bake. It is unbelievably quiet and easy to use (and clean after use). It is more than powerful enough for anything I've thrown at it. My last stand mixer died after less than 3 months of light use.This mixer handled all of my Christmas cooking/baking, including 6 loaves of Panettone and several dozen cookies, mashed potatoes for 10 and dough for dinner rolls. My daughter is gluten-free so I bake bread and muffins for her each week. Last night I made pizza dough (wheat and gluten-free) in what seemed like no time at all. I add the ingredients, set a timer and let it do its thing while I concentrate on other tasks.
I am happy with this toner cartridge replacement. Print quality is excellent!

I first encountered an Aviva dispenser and shower basket in a well known hotel chain. It worked well in that environment, where it probably received a lot of abuse and worked well. For that reason, I decided to try it. This dispenser/shower basket appears to be well made and works as well as the one in the hotel. It was easy to install and, unlike dispensers that I have had in the past, this one was very easy to fill.
This switch seemed sturdier than the broken OEM switch it replaced. No issues with putting it in. It worked flawlessly.

My print quality has been bad for a while and I figured my toner cartridge, which had lasted beyond the recommended number of pages, was due to be replaced. I changed the toner cartridge and the print quality was still pretty bad. Then I noticed scoring on the drum.  I headed back to Amazon where I found this drum replacement that was less than 1/3 the cost of the OEM part. After putting it in and following the printer reset instructions, my print quality is like it was when the printer was new.

I purchased the Weber 6492 in the middle of August 2014 and it has worked well up to this week when, as others have reported, the temperature reading starting jumping around and occasionally settled on a non-reading of "LL". I am not hard on my things because I want them to last. I treated this thermometer, in particular, as if it was as fragile as an egg. But four days before Christmas, with baking still to be done, it stopped functioning properly.I didn't have the time or inclination to go out and buy another thermometer so I figured it was worth trying to change the battery, The battery is accessible by twisting the front part of the housing (the part with the buttons and LCD) counterclockwise in relation to the back.As it turned out, the battery was fine but the contacts must have had a little oxidation that prevented the front part from communicating with the sensor. After gently cleaning the contacts with a soft piece of fabric, It works fine now.

I bought a pair of this exact same shoe in 2004 and, at the time, was very happy with the fit and comfort. They are finally worn out after 10 years and I am replacing them. When I received my new pair, I immediately put them on and was pleasantly surprised that they fit the same. The quality appears to be the same as my earlier pair. I am happy with this purchase.

This android app (version 3.5.7.254), which is compatible with the Fire TV, works very well. The only issue I have is that it only supports surround sound in mp4 files. The reason is that the android version uses the codecs on your device (tablet, phone or Fire TV) to facilitate sound to your speakers. Hopefully they will figure out a work around.

I was skeptical about the Fire TV but I figured if I didn't like it, I could easily return it. I have been pleasantly surprised. It is well thought out and responsive. And like other Android devices, it can be tweaked if you are tech savvy. I originally bought it to run Plex so that I wouldn't need to use my HTPC which is necessarily far from silent. Plex runs well, although it is still a work in progress, and I am enjoying easy access to Amazon and Hulu streaming content. I have now finally free of my cable company.
These are large, sturdy bread bags that fit the loaves I bake in my 13" Pullman pan.

When I first received this mulch kit, I was a little disappointed to see that my Husqvarna model (YTH2042) was not on the compatibility list. I needed new blades anyway and the mulch plug fit so I pulled the old blades off and looked to see if the mulching blades were the same size. They were and it did not appear that they would hit anything when I started up the mower so I went for it and am happy I did. For the first time this summer, I did not have to empty a bagger. On my 3/4 acre lot, I would typically have to stop a dozen or more times to empty the accumulated grass and/or unclog the flow of grass to the bagger. Those days are now gone.
Great value compared to 4 oz jars that you'd find in the grocery store and my breads seem to rise higher than with other yeast.

I love this pan! It makes a perfect loaf of bread. I have not tried it with the lid yet because i have not found a whole wheat recipe that is perfectly sized so it doesn't rise beyond the confines and spill out. Good quality and the bread slides right out when it's done.
This was a direct replacement for OE resonator. Perfect fit with no issues whatsoever.

This cable initiates the docking mode on the S4 and makes it easy to play music or hear GPS directions through the car stereo. The cable is a bit long though and, for some reason, charges the phone more slowly than a shorter cable plugged into the same USB power adapter

Good idea but poor implementation. The plastic sides were so flimsy that they didn't stay together so the front piece with the lettering kept falling off. A dovetail groove for it to slide into would have helped.
I resisted buying one of these for years and I wish I had one sooner.
Easy to use and works great. I've caught a chipmunk every night since it was delivered.

This scale makes measuring ingredients for homemade bread so easy. I used to struggle with measuring cups and spoons and the inevitable spills.Turn it on, choose grams or ounces, place your bowl on it and zero it out. Then after you add each ingredient to the bowl, zero it out and the scale will allow you to accurately measure what you add next.

My teenage daughter is a picky eater and has recently needed to go off gluten. I've tried several gluten-free bread mixes and this one is far superior to all the ones I've tried. The best part is the price of this product brings the price of a loaf of gluten-free bread down to what I was paying for a loaf of wheat bread.I very often use this mix in place of all purpose flour. Pamela's Products web site has many recipes you can use this mix in. I have made pie crusts, biscuits and hamburger rolls that were all really good. When making bread, I've recently replaced a 1/4 cup of the mix with amaranth flour and added 2 additional tablespoons of extra water to give it more of a whole "wheat" taste.This product does not come with yeast. The recipe for bread, which come on the side of the one serving bag, is located here:http://www.pamelasproducts.com/products/baking-mixes/pamelas-gluten-free-bread-mix/
This is a great pan for making homemade hamburger rolls. It is top quality!

A 1/4 teaspoon of this in my homemade bread keeps it from going bad for over a week and helps the yeast work better. I was making a 2 lb loaf of bread and had to "shrink" my recipe to 1 1/2 lb because the loaves no longer fit in the storage bags.

After one use, this cable broke at the hood latch (which was new). This cable uses a plastic stop to hold the housing so the metal inside can move. The cable I was replacing used a metal piece, which makes more sense.

My 15 y/o daughter has a gluten intolerance and is a picky eater - a bad combination. Consequently, she doesn't eat much and is very thin. She does like pizza, but hasn't been able to eat it. I had planned to try to come up with a recipe for a good gluten free pizza crust (usually I make everything from scratch) but, on a whim, I picked up a box of this at the local Whole Foods and tried it last night. I was amazed.  Initially I was concerned with the gluey consistency, which is nothing like pizza dough. I followed the suggestions offered by "H. McLaughlin (Oregon)" and used olive oil instead of vegetable oil and an extra half teaspoon of salt. Additionally, I had to coat my hands in oil to get it to spread in the pan without sticking to me or the spatula. I also baked the crust for 10 minutes at the recommended 400 degrees before adding the toppings. My pan is 16" and it fit perfectly. My daughter ate a third of the pan by herself.  I will definitely make this again.
My girlfriend is a nut for frogs and she loves this necklace. It was a perfect addition to her Valentine's gifts. I think I'll be getting her the earrings next.
Parts for my Volvo tend to cost twice as much (or more) as parts for my other cars. It's nice to find a K&N filter that helps keep my maintenance costs down.

This manicure kit is beautiful. I love the flower design on the leather case- I think the design makes the product very appealing.This kit includes everything that I will need for a perfect manicure. There are two different size of clippers, tweezers, trimmers, filers, blackhead remover, scissors etc. All these items are made of good quality stainless steel and are sharp and well made. I can see myself carrying the kit while traveling as it is also compact and can easily fit my makeup box.I more than recommend this kit, it is beautiful and useful at the same time.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

Perfect to trim facial hair. I use it regularly and it works well. The trimmer is lightweight and very easy to hold. It does not pull the hair but trims it off smoothly and nicely. There is no irritation after use. I have used it while taking bath without any problem.The LED light is a good feature to have, though I dont use it regularly.  It requires 1 AA battery which is not included with the product.  The base is well constructed and provides stability to the trimmer. It is very easy to clean, I rinse the blade under running water after use.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

These temporary tattoos are gorgeous. My daughter loves it. It is very easy to put on  Cut the tattoo that you would like to use, remove the cover, place it on the skin and cover it with damp napkin for couple of minutes.The tattoos are shiny and has metallic luster. They last maybe one or two baths and then they start coming off- I think that is the normal tattoo life span. If you want to remove the tattoo before that, scrub it off with oil and soap. This set has 5 sheets of tattoos wtih tons and tons of designs.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

There are so many things that I like about this mat: It is a play mat that can be converted to bag after use. This feature is what makes this bag very attractive. The play mat is large and my two kids can sit on it comfortably. The play mat is water proof, it is made of vinyl type of material. Easy to wipe it down with wet wipes. I have this is blue color, the color is true to the picture. It has slight cushioning which I think is perfect cold days. There are two mesh pockets to store small toys- one for each of my kid. After use, just close the mat and pull the string. One other advantage I can see is that, it can be easily used as a picnic mat. It is highly portable and convenient.Overall good product.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

Bento boxes are like the in thing now. I remember my school days when I sometimes carried a big lunch box with small boxes in it for snacks. These bento boxes are so convenient as compared to that.This product includes 6 lunch boxes. The main box are all of same color- transparent plastic and the lids are all of different colors. I use them mainly for my sons school lunch. They are very easy to open and use. They fit the standard lunch insulated lunch bag perfectly leaving space for cutlery and paper napkins. They are dishwasher safe and appears durable.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

My little one loves this decal. It is very kid oriented- It is fun, has bright colors and cute animals. It is very easy to install. There are two sheets in this product. My suggestion is to first decide a strategy as to where and how to put it and then it is very easy. Just peel the decal and paste on the clean smooth wall. If, in case, you do make a mistake remove the decal and redo.The decals came in excellent condition and on time. I had no problem with this order.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

This is a great addition to a kids bedroom. I got these in multi colors- blue, yellow, pink, green, white and they are very pretty.They are made of plastic- the wings of thinner plastic than the body. The wings can be molded in any fashion to give it the 3D look. Each butterfly has small powerful magnet on the back. It can also be attached to any other surface with the help of adhesive foam. I personally like the magnet to foam.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I am surprised with the quality of these bottles. They are made of thick yet flexible silicon material. They come in different three sizes. Each bottle has preprinted labels on it which I know I will not be using but it is a good feature to have. The labels can be changed as needed by holding the bottle and twisting the lid. Each bottle is of different color- Blue, pink and white.There is a suction pad on each bottle and it is able to hold the weight of the bottle and its contents without any problem. It is leak proof.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I was bit skeptical about the sheep print but man it is beautiful. The scarf is very soft and delicate. I have it in neutral color and goes well with casual clothes.  It is a perfect light weather scarf. It is an infinity scarf and goes around the neck twice comfortably.It comes beautifully packaged in mesh bag and can be considered for gifting. I am more than happy with this scarf.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

These night lamps are stunning. They are little smaller than I expected but more beautiful than I imagined.  The plus part of these are they are touch operated. How cool. I have one next to my sons bed and for once I wont be mad at him for hitting the lamp. We love the three touch feature of these night lamps. They are ultra- modern and very well made.They came beautifully packaged, there was no problem with the order.I am more than happy with this order, I plan to order more of these lamps in future as gifts.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

This ring looks nice and funky. It came in well packaged and delivered on time. I had no problem with this shipment.My husband does not wear it regularly but when he does, he wear it couple of days in a row. It fits him perfectly. The ring was true to size. It is very comfortable to wear. My husband does not have metal or silicon allergy, this ring did not irritate his skin.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I have used face steamer when I was in my teens and loved it. But then over the years I stopped using it more out of laziness. I am however glad I have this steamer now.First of all  It is very compact. It does not take up a lot of storage space. There is a water tank at the back of the steamer and can fill enough water for 8-10 minutes of steam session. In my experience, do not use more than 10 minutes at a time and not more than once a week. I, may be wrong about this but this is what I used to do in my teens. Also there is how much of hot steam you can take continuously.After 10 minutes of using this steamer, I felt my skin very soft and clean and very relaxed.I love this facial steamer, definitely recommend it.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I have kept this picnic blanket in my car. It is very compact and does not take up a lot of space. A family of four (two adults and two kids) can sit comfortably on this blanket when it is fully unfolded.The top side of the blanket is made of polyester kind of material and can be cleaned easily. The underside of the blanket is waterproof. The blanket can be cleaned with wet cloth and can be hanged to dry. It does not have a lot of cushioning and is comparable to a standard picnic blankets that are available in the market. I love the Scottish tartan pattern and I have it in green color.Definitely recommend this picnic blanket.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I love wearing leggings whether is it for workout or a casual outing. They should be comfortable that's all.These leggings are very comfortable and made of super soft stretchy material. The legs of this legging are black and waist band comes in different color. I got this in blue color and it looks exactly like that in picture. I got medium size and it fits me perfectly. I have used it a couple of times now and have washed it in the washing machine with my regular clothes. I did not notice any shrinkage or loss of color.I definitely recommend these leggings.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I have a slight hearing loss in my left ear which is hereditary. While I do not have problem hearing normal conversation, I miss words in a low volume conversation. This hearing aid is perfect for me. It goes from level 1 to level 4 and I use it only on level 1 which is perfect when I want to listen to TV on low volume. There is an on and off switch on the unit, so I switch off the unit without removing it from my ear.The unit comes fully charged and can be used right out of the box. There are couple of different ear buds provided with this kit. The unit can be used in either ear and sits perfectly on the ear. The unit can be recharged which I think is a biggest plus point for this unit. A small brush is provided with this unit for cleaning the unit after use.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

This case is perfect for outdoor installation of nest cam and drop cam pro. The case is sturdy and can withstand bad weather. These cameras are not weather proof and this case can provide good protection for these cameras if you decide to install it outside for security. The installation and use is very easy. The mount can be rotated in 360 angle and the chord is sealed properly and does not allow any moisture to get in.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I should have started using this type of splatter guards years ago. My hand mixer has food stains on it that I tried to remove with no luck. It is a great hand mixer but looks very ugly and worn now.This splatter guard is very easy to use. Insert the mixer through the large opening in the center and keep the lid balanced on the bowl. Now I did see that the lid moves sometimes when I used the mixer so I have to hold it down. It fits a small to medium size bowls without any problem.Apart from using it as a splatter guard, I also use it as general purpose lid to cover food.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

Love the pouch that came with this clipper set. It is very well made and can hold the two clippers beautifully. It can be easily carried on trips in this pouch.The clippers are very well made and appears durable. I have always used angled clippers and prefer them over the straight clippers but it is a personal choice. I had no problems cutting my nails with this this clipper.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

We installed these lights inside our corner kitchen cabinet which is huge but dark. It is never easy to find stuff in there. These lights were more than perfect for the cabinets. They are not only easy to install but provide a good amount of light in the cabinet.  There are four lights in this pack and the rest of the lights we installed in our kids bedroom, tool room and kids bathroom. They are highly motion sensitive and can detect slight motions.There are two modes- On and Auto. I have it on auto which means it will detect any motion. On mode leaves the light on, which is a good feature if you plan to use it as a night light. The lights require 3 AAA batteries which are not included in this package.More than love this product.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

These gloves are adorable. They are very well made and fit me perfectly. The fur detailing on the glove compliments the glove beautifully. The fit of the glove can be adjusted slightly using the adjustable tie on the wrist. The gloves are very warm and I did not see any missed stitching on the glove. The fingers are not covered which can be an advantage and a disadvantage. I like the exposed fingers as it is easier to use electronics.I received the gloves in excellent condition and on time.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I love this garden hose on many levels:1. It is very well made and appears durable.2. There are 7 different spray modes for various occasions. I have used almost all the settings so far. I use the jet setting to clean my deck, shower setting for my lawn and also to give my dog a wash, soaker is to water my pot plants, mist is for gentle water spray on delicate flowers, center, cone and flat also to water my lawn. Navigating between modes is also easy.3. I would recommend checking each setting before using- jet is little powerful so be careful while using it for long time on deck, shower is little powerful too so I use a lower water setting to giving my dog a bath.4. It fits a standard hose.5. It is easy to install and remove.6. The handle grip is perfect and the spray handle is smooth.Overall good qualityProduct received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I truly love this corset. It is beautiful and very well made. I got a size larger than my regular size which fitted me perfectly.The top part of this bustier is satin and the bottom part is lace printed on the bottom. I had to slightly adjust the top part to fit me. The lace on the back can be used to tighten the corset as to your liking.  In addition to this lace, there are zippers on the side as well. I first adjusted the lace on the back and have used the zippers ever since. It also comes with a thong.I have this corset in black. It is true to color, runs slightly smaller as expected, elegant and very well made. Definitely recommend.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I used it this mic to record my training sessions at work. The quality of recording is very good. It was crystal clear without any background noise. The mic was very easy to install and use. It is very basic mic and perfect for me to record my presentations and training sessions. It comes with a clip to secure the mic to my dress and comes with an extra replacement mic.Very good quality mic. There was no problem with the shipment and packaging.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

These shower rings are definitely made of good quality material. My kids pull and tug the shower curtain everyday while taking bath and the rings and shower curtain are still in excellent condition. The rings are easy to use and they glide smoothly on the curtain rod. The main change for me with these curtain rings is that they are closed. This prevents the curtain to fall off from the ring.Overall love it, goes well with my shower curtain.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased reviews.

There are so many things that I liked about this socks:- they are super comfortable and soft- they are tightly knit and feels cozy after wearing.- comes in three patters/ colors and two of each pattern. So we divided them up, three for my husband three for me.- they fit my husband perfectly, he wears size 10 shoes. They are slightly big for me, I wear size 7.- the low cut design looks nice on casual shoes- did not see shrinkage in size after washing. If there was then it was minor. I washed them with my regular clothes.- comes packaged in nice box- was delivered on time and in excellent conditionOverall very good, highly recommend.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

The leather bracelet is very well made and the braiding detailing on this bracelet is beautiful. It looks like the bracelet is made of genuine leather but I am not an expert. It is soft and wraps around the wrist easily without any stiffness. There are extra holes in the end to adjust the bracelet length. It can be worn by both men and women but frankly looks nice on my husbands hand than mine. The bracelet did not have any frayed ends or missing stitches.It was delivered in excellent condition and on time. I did not have any problem with this order.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

Beautiful pendant. I loved the rose gold with white stones combination, looks classic. It can be worn on any occasion. The pendant has a nice gleam to it which makes it looks expensive. It is medium sized and reaches just below my neck. In fact I am wearing this necklace as I type my my review.It came beautifully packed in a nice box and can be considered for gifting.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

A-Flow Waterfall and Rainfall shower head is very easy to install and use, no additional tools are needed. It comes in chrome and plastic finish and is modern and sleek. One good thing about this showerhead is that it comes with a hose. That is a big plus point for me. There are three settings in this showerhead- rainfall, waterfall and combination of both. I love both the settings and did not see any reduction in water pressure in any of the water settings.I also did not see any leaks so far.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I have been using this port daily for over a month or even more. It is my bedside charger and I every night I charge my phone, tablet and my sons phone with this. Each of the 5 port is assigned to various devices such as Iphone, Android, Ipad etc. I noticed that if I use the port for a different operating system, it does not charge fast. But if I use Android to android it is very efficient.I am more than happy with this product and highly recommend it.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I cook daily twice a day so I tested these knives right away. Here are my observations about the knives: They are extremely sharp. They can slice thick vegetables such as onions, carrots etc very easily. Cutting softer vegetables is piece of cake. Each knife has its own protective case. The knife handle provides a good grip. This is supposed to be 100% ceramic.I am a big fan for ceramic knives. I love how they stay sharp for years. They also do not rust, however they crack. If you drop them on the floor, there is a chance that they will break. Since it is ceramic, I do not expect them to go dull easily. However, I will only know this after months and months of use. They looks very nice and are very light to handle.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I love hydration backpack especially when I go on short hikes. They are convenient to use. I have a couple of them that I use alternatively, which means the ones I find immediately, and here are my thoughts about this bag: This hydration backpack is very well made to start with. The material is good quality and I love the color. Hydration bladder in included with the backpack.  I washed the hydration bladder a couple of times before use. I did not see any leak in the bladder. I also tried the hydration bladders of same capacity and they fit the bag without any problem. It is a small backpack and there is not much space left in the backpack after inserting the hydration bladder. So this backpack can be used for small trips in my opinion. The bladder can be removed and it can be used as a regular backpack too.Overall opinion- love it.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

Before you start using this scale, do not forget to calibrate- Follow the instruction manual on how to calibrate.This scale is very sensitive, so you will notice a change in weight when you open or close the lid. It is very compact and the weight display is digital and easy to read. The numbers are very large and easy to read. Comes with own set of batteries, weights, storage case and tweezers.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

When my mom recommended me to use a belly wrap after my first pregnancy, I laughed at that suggestion. But during my second pregnancy, my doctor recommended it and I had to swallow my pride and apologize to my mother.I have a belly and I am ashamed of it. So I decided to give this belt a try. I like that this belt is adjustable as my belly reduces and is extremely thin. It can be easily worn under clothes whole day long. I am only wearing this for last couple of weeks and did not see significant reduction on belly size but I do feel that it needs to be used for a longer duration to see results. But when worn under clothes it makes my tummy appear flat which makes me feel awesome.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

There are a few things that I absolutely need in a wallet: A good number of card slots to sort my cards by credit cards, debit cards, library cards etc. A long compartment to store the cash in it. An ID section to store my office id in. Compact in a way that I can just carry that wallet instead of my purse when I step out for lunch. It should also fit my large purse comfortably. Stylish and trendyI think this wallet more or less covers my main requirements. It is very well made and the stitching on the wallet is immaculate. The wallet can be closed with a snap closure and definitely has lot of card slots.I love this wallet.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I have a hydration bag that I like but it is just a hydration bag. I cannot carry anything else in that bag. I love this backpack mainly because it is a combination of backpack with hydration bag. The backpack is large and can carry enough items for a day long trip.About the bag: It is very well made, I love the yellow detailing on the backpack it looks very nice and trendy. 2L hydration bag is included with this backpack. Bag is sturdy and very well made. It can be loaded and unloaded very easily. I cleaned the bag with warm water a couple of times before using. The backpack can be used without the hydration bag which is perfect for any occasion. The backpack has lot of storage- the main compartment is big and deep and has sections to store tablets and electronics/ hydration bag. The front of the bag has additional pockets for easy organization The back straps have padding and very comfortable on shoulder. I did not notice any strain or marks after a day-long hike. The waist straps also have pockets, which I absolutely love. I could keep my phone and keys and small snacks in it.My overall opinion about this bag is definitely a buy. I highly recommend it.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

0:20 MinsWith two kids who are well versed with electronics but not with using them with clean hands, I need a lot of these cleaners. Of all the Duduma glasses I have, this one is by far my favorite. First of all I prefer sport sunglasses over regular sunglasses and I wear them everywhere. My son loves these silicon bracelets mainly because he likes emojis. There are 5 black and 5 white, so a total of 10 bracelets in one pack each individually labeled. Before using this towel I read other people's experience. As as the top reviewer for this towel suggested I washed this towel couple of times separate from my other laundry. It is a great microfiber towel no doubt about it. It absorbs lot of water as compared to the regular towel. Towel size is the same or about the same as we see in the salon. It is very thin and light weight and wraps around my head beautifully.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I use these clips for my own hair. I have medium to short slightly wavy hair. I love straight hair and I usually blow dry my hair after every wash. These clips do an excellent job of holding hair without pulling or tangling my hair. The grip is firm without hurting my hair. I am loving it so far.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

The brush design and the color are very appealing. The bristles are very soft and very gentle on hair. I have the brush in hot pink color. Now comes the handle or the grip, this is very nice to be frank but I feel there is a room for improvement there. I have small hands and I felt that the grip is small.Overall a good quality.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

I love diffusers, I keep collecting them. I keep this in my son's room because he loved the colors. We use it as a night lamp when we r not using it to diffuse essential oil. The colors are bright and pleasant.This product comes with the charging chord and a measuring cup for the water.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion

Beautiful beautiful pair of slacks. Super soft and comfortable. Love the design on the slacks, from far looks like I have tattoos on me. The elastic is good, the slacks stay put the whole day and did not slip. Stitching on the slack is perfect with no loose stitches. Love it.Definitely recommend.Product recipient at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

I had never used Geranium oil before and was really eager to try this oil. This oil is not fragrant per se but its not bad. I did not put it in the diffuser else we all would have left the house for couple of weeks. But I did find that it is a good insect repellent so I put a few drops on my deck before sunset. It is definitely effective for some time at least to keep insects away. I also put one drop in my son's shoes based on other reviewers suggestion and it helped. I left it overnight and the smell was all gone.The bottle is large and it should last me some time at least. It came well packaged and on time. I had no problem with this order.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased opinion.

Bracelet looks exactly like the picture. It is a cuff bracelet with beautiful intricate design. It is made of silver and it came nice and shiny from the seller. I expect some tarnish in future like any other silver jewelry. The bracelet is for small to medium wrist person and it sits beautifully on the wrist. It can be adjusted slightly to fit your wrist, without it losing its shape. It is very light and I hardly felt its weight the entire time I wore it.It comes beautiful packaged in a mesh bag inside a box.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

0:33 MinsWe love this led light on so many levels- my kids went crazy when we installed the light.- when I say installed I mean take it out of the box, find a nice spot and switch it on.- it is very easy to use. Tap once on the arrow and the light is on and tap again to switch it off.- to change the light simple move your finger gently on the shade panel. It is highly sensitive and the color changes instantly.- the light is very compact and does not take up a lot of space.- the battery is rechargeable and the charging chord is provided with the light.Overall a good product, my kids are having lots of fun with this one. Highly recommend.Product received at discounted rate in exchange of honest and unbiased review.

Overall I've really liked this serum. With winter on the way, my skin begins to dry, especially around my eyes.The gel itself has a very nice feel to it. My skin felt like silk upon first application. It moisturizes well and has a pleasant odor that is not heavy or have a perfume quality.The bottle is an easy to use pump that prevents messes and overuse. Application actually requires very little product and it only takes one to two pumps to totally treat your eye area.My eye area is typical and has begun showing she and sun damage so I'm relieved to have a product that minimizes the appearance of both. Beyond this, the product feels clean, without pulling or feeling unnatural on my skin. I love it! Please note, I received a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, which is what I've provided.

This is a thick serum that absorbs into the skin quickly.In addition to the retinol, this also contains hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E which has antioxidants that keep your skin healthy. The combination of these three ingredients make a potent formula that will help minimize and reduce signs of aging on your skin. In addition to this serum, I also recommend an eye serum containing vitamin K, a vitamin C serum and a high quality broad spectrum sunscreen. Combined, these will make a complete skin care regimen that will keep your skin looking as young as possible. Sample was provided at a discount for my honest opinion.

Adorable, well made buttons! Will be an awesome addition my craft stash, as this Spring I plan to use them to change out several cardigan set buttons for new, updated looks. Awesome deal! Please note, this set was received as a review sample, but all opinions are my own, thank you!

This is such a cute little purse! I love the design on the front and It is a great little purse but like I said smaller than I would have thought. Mind you, its perfect for a one glass, one phone kind of Saturday afternoons shopping with hubby! I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review

This is such a cute little coin purse! I love the design on the front and the Eiffel Tower Charm on it also! It is a lot smaller than I thought it would be though. Sad. But it is made of quality materials however. The actual coin purse is made from what seems to be a canvas type material, with the image printed right on it. The charm is made of thick sturdy metal material. The zipper part and the bottom of a faux leather type material. It has stood up to my teenager using everyday since she received it. Opening and closing all the time. Being thrown in her purse, and having a ton of change in it, does have wear and tear on anything, but this hasn't shown any sign of it as of yet. It is a great little purse but like I said smaller than I would have thought. I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review

My husband has used this product, and thus far has liked it. Keep in mind, it takes about 30-45 days to experience the full affect of any supplement. I found that taking the full dose (4 caps) all at once in the morning on an empty stomach was most effective. Also, I found it helpful to skip a few days here and there (i.e. take for 3 days then take a 2 day break). As others have said, for diabetics this supplement can help, but b=must be taken in-conjunction with a low-carb diet, too! I know that there are often questions about combining it with other supplements like Tribulus and arginine, but I have not found much difference by doing that. This product is a good value. Please note, I was given the opportunity to review this at a promotional rate in exchange for my opinion.

My husband has used this product, and thus far has liked it. Keep in mind, it takes about 30-45 days to experience the full affect of any supplement. I found that taking the full dose (4 caps) all at once in the morning on an empty stomach was most effective. Also, I found it helpful to skip a few days here and there (i.e. take for 3 days then take a 2 day break). As others have said, it is not like Viagra, where it works instantly. It is more like a tonic that helps after some period of time (for me it was about four days the first time trying it). I know that there are often questions about combining it with other supplements like Tribulus and arginine, but I have not found much difference by doing that. This product is a good value. Please note, I was given the opportunity to review this at a promotional rate in exchange for my opinion.

Economical and absorbent.  I have double duty for paper towels - cleanups and as napkins when it's just family. Unfortunately I can't do that with these because they're rough and look like wipes from an interstate gas station.  But I do use them in cleanups and cleaning and they're perfect for those uses.

My 16yr old son is completely happy with this.  What I can get from him - it's easy to handle.  I heard something about the buttons work great, it's fast to maneuver and I know he's not complaining so that about says it all!  He's going to be even more happy when he gets the new laptop to go with it!

I absolutely love this base.  The initial box is heavy but when taken apart, assembly is easy and then the two sides are easier to carry up stairs or maneuver through doors.  It's sturdy and the springs are strong.  The one and only drawback is the loss of approx. 15" height from a regular box springs added before mattress.  BUT we have 4" risers that work just fine and help with lifting the bed higher.  Thanks ~ we love it.

Husband and 18yr old son tested this product - here is the info they gave me:Pros:They both love that it's a wet/dry shaver. Taking it in the shower is the best. It's totally waterproof.It's very light weight and extremely quiet, great for not waking up the sleeping bear.The battery charges quickly, about an hour from dead.
