The original toy was a Christmas gift for my son and less than a month after having received it (mid January) a babysitter gave him the toy while he was in his highchair to keep him happy (not something I would have done) and my son dropped the toy from his highchair and the cage bars of the rattle broke. When this happened the toy broke into multiple pieces, some small enough to pose a choking hazard.Since my son loved the toy so much we decided to replace it and treat the second one  more carefully. The replacement toy took a a while to get to us and we had it roughly the beginning of April. Not even one month later the second rattle suffered a similar fate to the first. My son was carrying the rattle while walking and he tripped....the cage bars on the rattle broke, just as the first, causing the rattle to break into multiple (potentially dangerous) pieces.I love the concept of this rattle and in the brief periods in which it was holding up it was hands-down one of my sons favorite toys. The concept however needs to be backed by a more durable design because a baby toy should be durable enough to hold up to the way a baby plays and babies fall, and chew on, and shake and drop their toys all the time. Seeing as this rattle seems to have a weak point resulting in a very short lifespan of an expensive rattle, and due to the potential risk the broken pieces may pose as a choking or impalement hazard, I can no longer recommend this toy until the company has redesigned it for better safety and durability.

These Popushi ice pop molds are pretty much as described but be advised that they are not 100% pure silicone. When I was looking into purchasing silicone pop molds I was specifically looking for ones that were labeled either "medical grade" or "100% silicone". After much searching I couldn't find any with that description so I considered the good reviews and settled on these.Upon receiving I opened them up and twisted them at which point the colors turn to white. This is an indicator that the product is not pure but contains fillers. Good quality silicone is 100% silicone with no fillers, lesser quality silicone may use fillers up to a certain point that is deemed "acceptable".  The lesser quality pieces may not work as well or hold up as long but more importantly, the safety of silicone products that contain fillers isnt known. To test if silicone contains fillers, pinch and twist a portion of the piece; if you see any white its not pure silicone.I will probably be keeping these just since sending them back would be a hassle but if I ever re-order I will probably be purchasing from Kinderville instead since other Amazon customers say that they pass the 100% silicone test. I hope this helps you in your decision.

My daughter received this cradle as a Christmas gift this year and overall we are very pleased with it. We went with the unfinished version and it is made entirely of solid pine except for the bottom which is plywood. I would have preferred solid wood throughout but for the price I won't complain.It requires a bit of assembly that is fairly simple but you may wish to have a drill on hand. The particular cradle that we received did not have pre-drilled pilot holes in the cradle sides but my husband was able to quickly remedy that with his drill. Based on the illustration on the instructions it looks like there should have been pre-drilled holes so maybe ours just missed that step in the processing. There were a couple spots that were a bit rough and required a bit of extra sanding but nothing major...we had it all smoothed out in a matter of minutes.The company Little Colorado appears to make nice quality products but good luck contacting them if you need help or have questions. When I was originally looking into purchasing this cradle I had a few questions that I was hoping they could answer for me but I was never able to get a hold of them or even able to leave a message. I initially tried shooting them an email but the message kept bouncing back because their inbox was too full. I then tried to call but never got a live person...just an answering machine that was also full and unable to accept new messages.We paid roughly $25 for this cradle and for that price I think it is an great find. I highly recommend it.

We have the blue version of this potty and it has been great. The material is composed of about 80% plant fibers from bamboo and rice husks mixed with a resin created from amino acids to bond it all together. The material has the look, feel, and easy care of conventional (petroleum based) plastic but is more environmentally friendly and non-toxic for your little one.When it came time to potty train my daughter I didn't expect to purchase a small potty but thought I could get away with training her to use the big toilet off the bat. We did purchase a small toilet seat to fit on the family toilet but the large toilet was still a bit daunting for her. As soon as we broke down and purchased this "small potty" potty training took off and once she got the idea she quickly became more comfortable with the family toilet as well. Having this potty was very helpful to me.While cleaning it was certainly not fun it also wasn't too hard. To clean it I just dumped it out in the toilet, rinsed it with an attached spray nozzle (which I used for cloth diapering) added some soap, washed it out, dried it off with a paper towel and it was set for the next use. After several months of use the potty still looks like new and I am sure that it will hold up well through several more children. The company claims that the potty will biodegrade once composted but I expect that you could get just as much use out of this potty as you would it's plastic counterpart.When it comes time to dispose of the potty the company says that you should place the potty in a compost heap or bury it in the ground. The warm, damp conditions will begin to break down the natural resin and the potty will biodegrade over the course of about 3 years.

I recently purchased the 2.5" version of this monster ball at a Tractor Supply store for $4.99. The ball is roughly tennis ball sized, measuring almost 9" around, and is listed for small to medium sized dogs. Some small dogs may have a hard time retrieving this ball due to it's size but I have also seen some very creative and determined little dogs retrieve much larger items. This ball can be used for games of fetch or, for more solo play, you can load it up with small treats for your dog to "dispense". For heavy chewers I'm not sure I'd use it as a treat dispenser though since they may just eat the ball to get to the treats.The ball is vanilla scented, which seems odd to me since it is made for dogs. I can only imagine that the scent is to cover the natural rubber smell and make the ball more appealing to the pet owner and not the pet. This seems silly because how often are you really going to put your dog's ball up to your face close enough to be able to smell it? You would think Jolly Pets would pick a scent to make their ball more appealing to a dog....like bacon scented perhaps? The vanilla scent of this ball does absolutely nothing to spark the interest of my two dogs and if it does come close enough for me to smell it I find it just gives me a headache.When I saw this ball in-store, I wasn't particularly drawn to the monster theme but instead to the package that read "100% Natural Rubber", a material I've become more familiar with recently in my endeavor to cut back on the amount of plastic (petroleum based products) that I purchase. Natural rubber is a natural latex rubber derived from the Hevea brasiliensis tree. Natural rubber is very resilient, has a fair amount of stretch, and is waterproof (all good qualities in dog toy). This material is also recyclable as well as biodegradable. Since natural rubber is latex though anyone with known latex allergies should probably avoid purchasing this product. Sometimes allergic reactions to natural rubber products can be reduced depending on how the product is processed but since I don't personally have a latex allergy I cannot account for the amount of antigenic proteins found in this ball.The rubber material is reasonably durable but because this ball has a hollow center I have no doubt that any serious chewers could make quick work of this ball. I have two smaller dogs who really aren't chewers. With my dogs playing with this ball I highly expect it to last for years to come...just as long as the lawn mower doesn't get it anyway!

I'm always looking for natural alternatives to every product so I was very happy to find these pet collars made of cotton and hemp instead of the more common nylon. The collar is adjustable from 7"-13" so it will fit well on a small kitty (with plenty of room to grow) as well as on a food hogging Garfield cat. The collar is not a bright red but instead more of a brick red color (kind of a faded red) which I think looks nice.I am discounting one star because the clasp feels pretty flimsy. I'm really hoping it holds up well long term but it is the flimsiest clasp I believe I have ever seen on a cat collar. Perhaps the seller would argue that this is a safety feature, a "break-away" clasp, but I have seen breakaway clasps that still felt durable and well made. I guess time will tell how it will weather. I'll update this review if the clasp ever becomes a real problem.Overall, I am still happy with my purchase. I hope that is helpful to you!

I placed an order for the small, polished brass pet tag & quality wise it is very nice. It seems a bit big & heavy on my young kitty for the time being but I'm sure he'll grow into it. I like that it's not aluminum like the majority of tags you see in pet stores today.I am discounting one star because the seller engraved my name on the tag as well. I did not include my name in the information I sent them, nor did I want it on the tag. I wished to leave my name off in order for the more important information to have more space and be more easily read. Since I did not provide them with my name I can only guess that they pulled the name off my Amazon account & assumed I was the cat owner. Good thing I wasn't purchasing the tag for someone else.I requested the tag read:PET NAMEADDRESSCITY, STATEPHONE NUMBERInstead it read:PET NAMEMY NAMEADDRESSCITY, STATEPHONE NUMBEROverall, I like the tag and would recommend it. However, if you wish your name left off the inscription you may want to make that very clear in your email to the seller.---- UPDATE 11/13/2013 ----I contacted Lucky Pet Tags regarding the mistake on my tag and they quickly sent a corrected tag free of charge. My young cat found the original tag a bit annoying however and has taken to biting at it occasionally. His sharp teeth have scratched the original tag up quite a bit. For now the tag is still readable but if he keeps it up I doubt it will be very legible in the near future. I plan on holding onto the replacement tag until the first tag is either too scratched up to read or until my cat gets used to wearing it and leaves it alone. Hopefully he'll adjust to it soon, if not I hope that Lucky Pet Tags "lifetime warranty" is as good as they make it sound.

I ordered five of these combs and of the five that I received three had cracks in the wood and one was also very warped. The two that were in good condition appear to be very nice; they're attractive, well sanded, and the wood has a nice aromatic scent to it. The problem I have is just that the rate of success in receiving a well made comb doesn't appear to be very good, two out of five, that's only a 40% chance of receiving a well made item.The flaws were very easy to spot even before removing the combs from their packaging (they came individually enclosed in clear plastic packages). I'm not sure how the person who shipped them out did not notice the defects. All I can think is that he/she either didn't look at the items being sent or they just didn't care if they were damaged. If you do order this item you may want to send the seller an email with your order number and request that they look the comb over before shipping it out. Hopefully you have better success than I did.----UPDATE 10/30/2013-----A few days ago I contacted Amazon and informed them of the defective combs in my order. They responded and assured me that they would be going through their stock of this item in order to help prevent anyone from having the same misfortune I did. Hopefully all the damaged combs will be weeded out of Amazons inventory for now. I hope that helps everyone out! Good luck on your order!

The main reason I decided on these particular mice by Kong is because they are made entirely from natural materials, a big selling point for me. The colored fabric exterior is natural cotton, the ears, legs, and tail are leather, and the stuffing is cotton and catnip. I believe the only synthetic material on these little mice are the applique eyes.We received the red and blue set of mice and unlike some of the other reviewer's cats our cat (Henry) doesn't seem to mind the bright and unnaturally colored mice.  Henry is really not a picky customer though....he loves most stuffed toys. He's been enjoying carrying, tossing, and batting his new mice all around the house.The only reason that I am discounting one star is because the mice don't look nearly as nice or well constructed as they do in Kong's product picture. The mice we received, as well as the ones I've seen in stores, look cheaper and kind of mangy. The mouse features (ears, feet, tail, eyes) are poorly placed so while all the components are there they fail to really resemble mice.

I know this is meant to be a dog toy but I actually purchased it for a cat who loves to steal my children's stuffed animals. So far it is a big hit with Henry (the cat). He proudly drags this squirrel all around the house as if it were a trophy. It also seems to help keep Henry from taking the children's toys...at least as long as he hasn't misplaced his squirrel. This squirrel seems like it is made well enough, at least for our purposes. However if your pet is a chewer or likes to play rough it may not last long because the outer material feels kind of thin and not particularly sturdy.I like that this pet toy is made from renewable resources. The exterior fabric is a bamboo rayon (a synthetic derived from a natural source) and the stuffing is all natural cotton.  I try to avoid all synthetic materials when possible, and normally that would include rayon since rayon is derived from wood pulp that must be treated with chemicals like caustic soda, ammonia, acetone and sulfuric acid to make it useable as a cloth material. However, it can be difficult to find totally natural pet toys at a reasonable price. This rayon squirrel seemed like a good compromise and while it is not  "all-natural" or "organic" it is made from natural, renewable resources, it is free of petrochemicals, and best of all it is affordable as a pet toy.

I did a lot of research when it came time to find my children a good multivitamin. Since it is not mainly the amount of a given nutrient listed on the bottle that is important but instead that nutrients form and how much of it is bio-available that counts I was specifically looking for a whole food based supplement. Whole food supplements are, like the name suggests, supplements made from concentrated whole foods so they contain an array of natural vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, enzymes, co-enzymes, trace elements, and activators that naturally work together. Food based supplements allow your body to absorb the concentrated nutrients of whole foods as if they were a normal part of your everyday diet while synthetic supplements are treated by the body as if they were foreign substances. Some of these "foreign substances" are merely rejected while others (in order to be effective) absorb additional nutrients from your body, leaving your body's stores depleted. This is because synthetic vitamins have been isolated from the other nutrients that they would normally be paired with in nature, and without the presence of those nutrients they aren't usable to the body.Since I knew that I only wanted whole food vitamins that narrowed my search significantly; I found that there only seemed to be a few whole food options on the market that were child specific. While these vitamins from Bluebonnet may not be the cheapest supplement around I love that they are whole food based so that I can rest assured that my children are actually benefiting from them. My children also love the fruit flavors of these vitamins...they practically beg for these every morning. We have been very happy with our choice in Bluebonnet.I hope that helps you with your decision.

The grip on this picks is wonderful. They're very small and quite thick: not great for strumming chords but perfect for picking out single notes. The color is a striking blue, if that kind of thing is important to you. No complaints! Make sure to try out this style of pick if you're used to larger sizes, because it's a bit of an adjustment at first.

This is a very nice little laptop/tablet combo for anyone who needs to do basic, non-resource-intensive computing tasks. I wouldn't recommend this for gaming or graphics design, but for your basic browsing/email etc it's more than fine. The screen flips all the way around to turn the laptop into a tablet (with an onscreen keyboard).Pros - The device is thin but has a nice, solid feel to it - it doesn't feel flimsy. Quality keyboard. VERY impressive battery life.Cons - I found the touchscreen not as responsive as it could be, compared to e.g. an iPad. There's a lot of bloatware you'll want to uninstall.All in all, this has been a nice little backup laptop for me, at a very decent price.

This set makes for a thoughtful and actually USEFUL small gift. The packaging is nice and sturdy, and all three products are things almost anyone could use. I think referring to the container as a "limited edition keepsake tin" is maybe pushing it a little, but aside from that you can't go wrong with this nicely priced gift set.

Well, it's a yellow watch. A very, very yellow watch. With a very shiny gold ring around the dial. If you're looking for something like that, I highly recommend this one. As someone mentioned in another review, this watch is so bright that it's almost a neutral - it really goes with almost anything.

This is one of the best travel pillows I've ever owned. I'd never really considered memory foam stuffing for one of these neck pillows, but in hindsight it's the perfect thing to use. The velour fabric is very soft and comfy, but also causes the one problem I have with this product: it's on the warm side and, if used for a long time in a warmer environment, can get your neck a bit sweaty. If you're in an air-conditioned environment though (or, say, on a plane) it's the perfect travel pillow.
My wife loves these gold diamond cut earrings. They're very lightweight and delicate-looking, and the clasps are high-quality. Thumbs-up.

After using Bose headphones for many years, this is my first set of Sennheisers, and I couldn't be more pleased. The sound quality is tremendous - crisp with solid but not overpowering bass. I'm not crazy about the case these come in, but then that's not a big dealbreaker for me as these will mostly sit on my desk. If you're buying these as your on-the-go set, you may want to check out the case first to make sure you're happy with it. All in all, this is a wonderful set of headphones.

So, it has come to this - I am reviewing toilet paper. The price of being a Vine Voice! I must admit here that I am not an expert on the product. Although, actually, I take that back -- I am, after all, a life-long user of the product, and was trained at a young age on its proper usage. Based on this decades-long experience, I hereby pronounce that this specific brand, variant and packaging are perfectly fine. It does the job, as it were. I have experienced no malfunctions thus far. In terms of design, well, it's plain white paper so, you know, not the fancy kind that has, oh I don't know, inspirational verses or the faces of your enemies printed on it. But I can find no fault in this simplicity -- when it comes to this product, straightforward is good. Buy and use with confidence.
My son is a huge Minecraft fan and loves this little plush Ocelot.

This is a very decent pair of in-ear headphones from AmazonBasics, especially given the price. They come with three sizes of rubber caps and a nice little cloth pouch. In terms of quality, it's not Bose, but definitely acceptable, again given the price. I've been using these as backup earphones in case I forget to throw my good ones into my gym bag, and I've been happy with the results so far.

Well, there's only one reason NOT to buy this bulb over regular lightbulbs or the standard energy-efficient ones, and that's the higher initial investment. I guess if you see the $19.99 price tag for this compared to a couple of dollars for the other ones, you may be tempted to go for the cheaper ones. In the long run, though, these LED bulbs will save you a lot of money (need to be replaced much less often and use less energy) and, for the same reasons, a lot of time. They're also great because they're dimmable, unlike the old-fashioned energy-efficient bulbs (which just flicker on or off without dimming). These are a great investment.

Well, I have a six year old boy who is somehow really into the Beyblade cartoon, and he loves this toy. Before we got this, he'd made up his own little beyblade game with a couple of tops and a very rickety cardboard arena, and he and his friend played with that thing for a long time. When I got out this set with its colorful arena and customizable little action figures, they both pretty much screamed with joy. If your kid isn't into the cartoon, I don't think this would be worth the investment, but otherwise it's a good toy that's provided hours of fun here so far.

This is basically a little portable TENS unit like you might have used in physical therapy. I don't feel like it had the same effect, but being so small and portable makes up a lot for this. The unit is easy to set up and use. The sticky pad used to apply it doesn't last very long and loses its "stickiness" after a few uses, which is maybe the main drawback. This device will provide some relief for your lower back pain, but it's not the same as more professional units so depending on your situation and needs it may not be ideal for you. If you want something basic you can take along when traveling or driving, it's definitely a good option.

My 6 year old son loves this bottle. He thinks the pop-up mechanism for the spout is cool. It also doesn't look too "little kid" compared to sippy cups. He happily takes it with him to camp or school and can refill it whenever he wants. As parents, we like this bottle because it's sturdy and it doesn't leak. The only annoyance (for us) is the straw, which needs to be handwashed because it's too narrow to be safe in dishwasher.

I love the antique Mason Jar design of this hummingbird feeder, but the base is made of dinky-feeling, cheap metal, which feels completely out of sync with the sturdy glass feel of the container. I'm also not crazy about the hanger, which doesn't have a lot of room - it doesn't fit over the hook I use for other feeders in my backyard. I'm going to leave this feeder up for a bit to see if the birds like it better than I do, but as far as this human  concerned, this is probably my least favorite feeder out of the handful I now have in my backyard.

I'll start off by admitting that I am not an audiophile and not an expert when it comes to this type of equipment. I picked this product out of the lineup based on features and based on some of the other reviews here, which are clearly written by people who know more about the different types of receivers and their functions.As for me, as a layman user who hasn't used a receiver since the olden days in which stereo systems came with different components (record player, tape deck, speakers and so on) that had to be hooked up, I found this device both intimidating and, once I started setting it up, surprisingly easy to use thanks to the onscreen Setup Assistant, which more or less walks you through the whole process. Excellent idea for the novice - like me - but probably not necessary for the expert user.You can configure the system as a 7.1 channel system in one room (which, in the course of this process, I learned means 7 speakers and a subwoofer) for full surround sound, or you can configure it as 5.1 in one room with another 2 speakers in a second room. I have not attempted to set up a second "zone" yet so can't comment on this feature, but it doesn't look too complicated.The system is able to stream Spotify (my preferred means of music consumption nowadays). It can also be controlled via an iPhone/iPad app (and an Android one) so once you've got everything set up and hooked up, it can really simplify your multimedia experience: one device does it all.As for sound quality: again, I'm not an audiophile so I refer you to the experts for that, but to my layman's ears everything sounds great.In closing: my main concerns were with ease of use and compatibility with AirPlay/Spotify etc. and I can find no fault in those regards. My only suggestions: I'm fairly sure similar functionality can be found in cheaper units, so I'd look around before committing to this (rather pricey) device unless you are confident that you really need everything this Denon AVR-E400 delivers.

This is a beautiful watch. The first thing that'll strike you is the gorgeous, luxurious packaging. This also makes it a great gift. The watch comes with a sturdy black leather band and a replacement brown leather band. I haven't tried to replace the band because I prefer the black band, but replacing it looks easy enough. (One point of warning: the bands are on the thick side, which means they'll be hard to bend initially, making it hard to get the end under the loop until you've worn it a few times.) All in all, this is a lovely, classically styled watch.

This is actually a fun and fairly well-made game for kids. If your child or children liked the Monsters Inc. Pixar movie, they'll probably be into this. My only recommendation would be hop on YouTube and watch a gameplay video there (just search for the product name) to make sure it's the right age range for your child. Leapfrog bills this as 4-7 years old, which is a HUGE range in terms of development already, and that doesn't take into account the individual child's style and ability. My child is almost 6 and played with it for quite a while, but he has a lot of experience with other educational games and decided this one was too easy and "boring" after a short while compared to some of the iPad games he's used to. I've seen parents complain this is way too easy for their 7 year old and others that it was confusing for their 4 year old. It all depends on your child's age and personality, so peek at a video before you commit. If you think it may be too hard now, it's a good way to introduce your child to something that can grow with them, but if you even suspect it might be too easy already, it probably will turn out to be a waste of money.

Starting off with the best feature: you can fill this feeder from the top. If you've ever refilled a hummingbird feeder, you know you usually have to flip them upside down to get to the opening, which means you have a good chance of getting the sticky leftover liquid all over your hands. With this top-fill one, you can just unscrew the top, refill, and done. Awesome idea.Also great: no leaks. I've had several feeders in the past, and they frequently started leaking after a while. I guess the plastic ones expand and contract in the sun, creating tiny gaps that allow the liquid to leak out. If you use hummingbird food rather than just sugar water, that'll create an ugly red stain underneath the feeder. Even if you don't, you can expect lots of ants or other critters to make a bee line for the sugary puddle of free nutrition. So, second plus of this model: no leaks, so far at least.Final plus: the ant moat! This isn't unique to this model, but it's something to look out for. The top has a little ridge, which will prevent lines of ants from wandering along the top of the feeder to get to the food.All in all, this is a very nice hummingbird feeder.

This is a great device to have in your emergency kit. It plays AM/FM radio as well as NOAA weather alerts. It also works as a flashlight. You can also charge cell phones and USB devices from it. The radio itself can be charged with a handcrank, via USB (plug it into your computer etc) or with sunlight. You can also charge it with an AC adapter, but you have to order the adapter separately, which is a big minus in my book. Aside from the missing AC adapter, this is a great emergency radio/charger/flashlight.Note: since posting my review, I've been told that there's a model that includes the power adapter. The link is in the note below. If you think you'd use this method of charging the device, it obviously would make sense to order that model instead!

This is such a nice and comfortable sleep mask by OOSilk. If you're buying this as a gift for someone, know that it arrives in a very cute and nice package. I like that this is the largest sleep mask I've ever used, because it blocks out so much light to where I don't have to be bothered when I need to nap during the day.I deal with insomnia due to stress and can't sleep at night and this helps with me catching the rest I need in the day without the sun hurting my eyes or keeping me awake. After a long day of standing or a lot of walking, I experience really bad pain in my heels. I've tried gel insoles but they either aggravated me or began to slide around so I gave up. I've only experienced good things with this heel sock.I like that I can slide my sock over this and it still be comfortable and my shoe fits fine while I have these on. They have helped me not experience the bad pain I was having. I don't find myself stopping to look for a place to sit down and rest my feet as often anymore. This review is for the "Essential Oil Diffuser w/ Music" This is a very nice diffuser by TurnRaise. Not only is it quite cool looking but it's very well made and extremely easy to use. The instructions are easy to read and understand. Mine works great and I'm even using it now as I write this review. :)You can use this as a regular humidifier if you don't have any essential oils. It will still put out the mist from the water and make the room fresher and easy to breathe in. If you have essential oils- even better, and it's quite simple to add the drops in. Use only 2-3 drops per 100ml water at a time.. If you use more, the oil can clog the system and cause malfunction. Speaking of malfunctions, the instruction manual points out that if you are using essential oils with this diffuser- they must be 100% natural, because anything else can cause this product to malfunction.With the weather turning off colder, I'm usually under some blankets and sometimes have my heater on nearby which can make the room very stuffy but this diffuser has been helping give the room moisture so I can stay warm, yet still be able to breathe well.The timer lasts for 180 minutes, 120 minutes, 60 minutes or 30 minutes. It's very easy to set the time on the diffuser. The "Music" is a repeated sound of, in my opinion, what sounds like a waterfall or rain with a bird chirping, and then a seagull and ocean waves. I had first thought the "Music" would maybe be a Bluetooth button to sync with your phone where you could listen to your favorite songs on. I think that would be great but I am mentioning this in case you assume what I did. This is more of a sound machine with one track with the birds to listen to when you're relaxing after a long day and want to pretend you're somewhere else, hehe :)If you're not listening to the sound of the birds, it's easy to turn that option off and have this diffuser without the sound effects. This diffuser is quite quiet and if you were to nap with this nearby, I wouldn't think the sound would keep you awake. I'm quite a light sleeper, yet having this nearby relaxes me and keeps me resting.This would make a very nice holiday gift to give to someone you care about. I'm quite pleased and will be using this a lot through the Winter. Highly recommend! I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I have only used flat irons prior to coming across this brush so I was quite interested in trying this out but then before it arrived, I began reading some reviews and started getting worried on how well this would or wouldn't work.So, my opinion on this product is that while I'm impressed and like it and will definitely continue using it- I do have a list of cons about it.What I like about the product--It does what it claims on my hair. It straightens it very well and I can turn the brush a certain way and create a nice curl for my layers. But do I think that this would work amazingly well on someone with extra curly hair? I'm honestly not sure. I'd have to see results on a friend before coming to that conclusion. I have wavy hair and it worked great on mine.-It makes my hair look extremely healthy which surprised me, because I have bleached/dyed hair that can look quite fried after using a flat iron but with this brush, my hair came out bouncy and healthy. That's my main reason for my star rating, because I am very impressed with that.-My hair holds the straightening/slight curling very well. By the end of the day, my hair isn't back to looking like it did prior to using this.-I didn't get burned by this product.-Didn't give me any frizzies.-It didn't tangle up my hair and create a mess like some products I own have. It didn't rip any of my hair out.-It's easy to hold, my hand doesn't grow tired of holding it for a while.-The cord is long and nice and doesn't bunch up and tangle like other products I own.What I didn't like about the product--The buttons are in the worst possible area.. While using this, I constantly accidentally press the temperature buttons just because of where they're located when you're holding this. I highly dislike that.-Takes a long time to heat up to the temp I want.-It had a weird smell at first but after it was on for a while, that dissipated.-Even though, it's pretty easy to figure out how to use this, I didn't like the instruction manual because it was badly translated to English and some of it just didn't make any sense at all.So do I recommend this product? If you have hair like mine, I totally would because I am happy with this (except where those buttons are!) but if you have quite curly hair... I'm honestly not sure. I can test this out on a friend when I get a chance and update my review to let you know. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I always trust Number One Nutrition and this product has not let me down. It makes me have better posture and it also helps with my lower back pain. I wish I could say it looks as good on me as it does in the model in the photo up there Lol. I am quite impressed with this bottle of Rhodiola Rosea by the Vitaminery. I have only taken Rhodiola once before, about a year ago, and even though it wasn't a miracle pill to me, it still helped keep me calmer in anxiety situations. It was a much smaller dose than what this bottle by this company contains.. This bottle is just the right amount of a dosage for me because I feel better when I take it.I deal with pretty high anxiety and suffer from panic attacks. I'm a worry-wart so that only adds to my anxiety and with the stress and anxiety I experience, it can put me in quite a depressed state semi often. This has really helped lighten my mood and made me feel not only calmer in situations, but in a happier state where I don't find myself being the normal paranoid, worry-wart I am. It also has helped me become more productive during the day to get a lot taken care of off my to-do lists.I'm really happy with this bottle. That being said, I understand all our bodies are different and what may work for some, may not work for others. I can only tell you my experience with these, how they have helped me but I would hope they'd help you too. I haven't experienced any side effects. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Loving this foot cream by LeliaSea. I was impressed the minute I began putting it on my feet. My skin instantly began feeling better. I've had issues lately due to having walked way too much at a recent convention I went to that lasted several days- my feet haven't felt the same since. Rough and just an uncomfortable feeling but when I put this lotion on, I was impressed right away so I am definitely continuing to use this.I love how fast it absorbs! Usually, when I apply lotion to my feet, it takes quite a while for it to sink in and then if I need to get up and get something, I end up rubbing the lotion off onto the carpet. With this foot cream, it absorbed so well, that when it was time to get up and go to a different room, I didn't have that slippery feeling on the smooth surface flooring, nor did it rub off onto the carpet I walked over either.I really like the scent. It's not too faint and not too strong, in my opinion. Plus, who doesn't want nice smelling feet? :) I can honestly state that my feet are healing and feeling like they used to. If I could rate this product more than five stars, I would. The only thing I dislike about this product is the small size. I want a huge bottle of this because it's so great hehe :) I highlyyy recommend this!!! I don't think you'll be disappointed at all and if somehow you are- send me yours kthx! ;)  I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

The lipstick is nice but the shade is a lot darker than I thought it'd be.. I thought it would have more of a pinkish shade but instead, on me anyway, it's quite brown. It washes me out and isn't flattering on me, but overall as a lipstick- it's very smooth and goes on well and feels nice. It doesn't last too long on me, I find myself reapplying quite the number of times during the day. I love the creamy feeling of it.. I will purchase this kind of lipstick again but in a much lighter shade that I am sure about having a pinkish tone.

My husband's car can become quite the mess if I haven't been in it for a while, cleaning it out. I've tried putting plastic bags from the grocery store, in his floorboard so when he has something to throw away, he can throw it in there... except usually, the bag gets turned over after a while and everything spills out, so when I saw this Car trash can and Organizer, I knew I needed to get it for his car.Ever since I put this in his car, everything has been much nicer and cleaner which makes the neat-freak in me very relieved and pleased.I love that it is waterproof and easy to clean if needed. The material is very high quality and feels very nice. The Velcro used is very tough and nice. I love that it comes with an adjustable buckle so I can attach it in the car and it won't go anywhere, no falling over and spilling anything out.I am really glad it has 3 pockets to fit things in. This would work well for me to take on vacations as an extra bag to carry items in. I'm really happy with this and have already recommended it to some family and friends. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Winslows beautifully-written journey of hope that chronicles her seven-year battle with infertility. She details her struggle with the desire to have a child and remain strong, even when it appeared hopeless. This memoir is a touching tale of her highs and lows through this period in her life, discussed in a frank and honest mannerfrom the concerns over health to the disappoint over test results. Ms. Winslow has created a devotional that will touch any couple (or mother) who is struggling with the feelings of inadequacy and how to triumph over it through prayer and positivity.She addresses infertility and miscarriage, sharing her own thoughts and emotions. Through scripture, she guides you through the building of hope. This is a must-read for anyone who has struggled to become pregnant.

Gail is twenty-two and looking for a flingno strings attached. Shes losing her mother to cancer and time is growing short. When she loses the bracelet her mother gave her, she jumps into a pool to find it and something grabs her waist. Its Scott, the neighbors gardener and hes trying to save her. The sight of the gorgeous, muscular hunk of man sends Gails mind racing, but Scott is trying to get his life on track. The last thing he wants to deal with is a crazy rich girl who wont let up. But still, he recognizes that lost, sad look in Gails eyes.The story unfolds over the course of this big, four-volume set. Author Lena Bourne does a terrific job creating a couple of believable character that I quickly grew to care about. Both Gail and Scott were sexy, funny, and complex. I am still getting into New Adult, but this is one of my favorite books from the genre so far. Its a real page turner! Excellent job all aroundIll definitely look for more from Ms. Bourne!

This book explains common sensesomething that most people have, but do not understand how to access. This book opens the avenue to the understanding of common sense and how it is blocked by emotions. Author Tahmid Hussain also explains the art of preventionsomething we all know, but again cannot understand when or how to use. There is also a section that discusses arguing  primarily wasting ones time with those who love to argue and prove their point, even when they do not even have a valid point. These are people to avoid and more important, these are the kind of people you do not want to become. Arguing an invalid point does nothing but hurt yourself. This is a quick, but highly recommended read for anyone who is looking to expand their thinking.

Lovely Italy is my dream vacation. The culture, the art, the foodeverything about the country seems exotic. And to plan a vacation to the country takes a lot of time and some research.This information-packed book is a practical guide to what to see and do while visiting Italy. Whether you are looking to make the trip as an individual or go with your family, this is an excellent guide to accommodations that are child-friendly and which places are better on the pocketbook. Plus, Lak, the author, gives away some of Italys secrets regarding tipping and saving money.I love mysterious and unique place to see when Im vacation, so the section Off the Beaten had to be the most valuable, in my opinion. From caves to ghost towns (my favorite), this book is a wonderful resource.If a trip to Italy is in your future, I would suggest this book. No filler and fluffjust terrific information.

Many people aren't fans of these collars, but I have to say this collar worked like a charm on my problem barker. My dog doesnt make a sound until nighttime when he goes out and most of the neighbors are turned in.  And while his barking is typically nothing, it does get super-annoying.This kit came with:1 x Remote Transmitter1 x Collar Receiver1 x Adjustable Nylon Belt1 x USB Charging Cable1 x Charger1 x Test Bulb2 Set of Metal Probes1 x user guide1 x quick guide It was quickly fitted and adjusted for use on my dog right out of the box. The device has 4 modes: static shock, vibration, beep and light. And there are 100 levels of static shock and vibration stimulation, but in my situation, the vibration and beep mode was plenty. My dog is a quick study, I guess; therefore I havent had to literally shock him  yet. I may be able to give this collar up on the dog at some time soon, but right now, hes doing awesomenot misbehaving an staying quiet with he needs to. I would recommend this collar to any dog owner, no matter if the pooch stays in or out.

Myanmar (or Burma), under a tyrannical dictatorship for five decades, holds its people under fear and complete control. Aung San Suu Kyi is a political prisoner under house arrest for most than 15 of his 21 year-sentence is known as Burmas Mandela, but now has the chance to change the future of her beloved country in the upcoming election in 2015.The freedom fighter and Nobel Peace Prize winner is pushing to lead her country to freedom with her leadership skills. She is quickly swaying many voters to her side, but still there are other who believe she is only a puppet of the west because of her British family ties and democratic views. But there are other players involved, like those who are trying to rig the balloting just as they had done in the 2010 election.Suu Kyi is Burmas final hope for liberation, but is she there for the wests gain? Her enemies are many within the Myanmar government and the possibility that she might be assassinated continues to grow in this fictional-based-on-fact account.I have little knowledge of Burma or its political history or current stance, but the book was engrossing and provided me with some in-depth history of an interesting culture. Well-written, fast-paced, and captivating, I surprised myself by my interest in reading and quickly finishing this book (I typically have little interest in political fiction). Peter Simmen has done a terrific job drawing the history of the troubled country while pairing it with a good piece of fiction. Engaging and I thought the US boasted the most corrupt government in the world!

I have a dog who loves to bark at night when he goes outany little sound in the yard makes him practically come out of his fur.  I purchased this collar to help control his night-barking, and so far its world great!  On the first bark, the collar sounds a short warning tone. The sound of the tone increases as the doggie continues to bark, all the way up to seven, growing stronger with each level. If your dog stops barking for thirty seconds, the collar then resets itself. In just a couple of nights, my dog figured it out and he stopped all that silly barking.This collar came with the receiver, manual, and replaceable 6V battery. It fits my dog perfectly shes a big girl and this collar is perfect for the low price. Id recommend it to anyone with a bigmouthed doggie.

Ive been interested in the concept of attraction for a while, but it seems all the books I downloaded were a bit confusing. Alexander Janzers guide is concisely written without a lot of fluff and filler. It focused solely on what you need to know to get started on changing your life for the better. In this short, but informational guide, I learned the three steps of manifesting, and things to avoid. Like most people, I am one who would love to become more financially stable. Janzer provides some important, yet easy, habits to learn that will manifest more money (such as checking accounts regularly, carrying money in your pocket, and simply placing a dollar bill in a position where you can see it at all times. If youre into vision boards, this works in a similar fashion, I assume. I recommend this ebook to anyone who is new to the concept of attraction or who would like a refresher. Excellent read!

This is a guide to better understanding life and how to act and react on the outside world. Author Tahmid Hussain explains that no matter the amount of formal education one might havethe number of book read and courses taken, nothing can replace real-life experiences. The knowledge taken from books is simply second-hand learning. It provides no real insight on ourselves and what we can learn about ourselves. In addition, Husssain indicates there is a notable lack of people using their own thoughts to make changes in their lives and changes in the environment in which they live. I agree whole-heartedly with this concept. Everywhere I look, I see people who are simply acting on the influence they have received from other people around them and even worse, the media. Where are all the original thinkers nowadays?  This brief booklet serves as an introduction to series on the topic of Logical Life, with contact information in case you wish to discuss (anonymously) some real life issues youd like to see addressed in future volumes.

The prolific Robin Fate is back with another huge collection of short, filthy tales that are sure to get your heart revved up. Containing dozens of hot n sexy tales that are sure to get you in the mood, I was able to enjoy the sexiest scenarios imaginable. All of these were insanely naughty, but my favorite one of the collection had to be Amber and Sam. From best friends to first times to naughty billionaires, these are some of most vivid erotica tales Ive read. Some of the situations arent exactly new but Fate provides such an unique twist on them, that you dont know what to expect.  Plus, the characters are relatable yet sexy as hell. Another excellent collection. Highly recommended!

I bought Clarks Nubuck Slip-on Shoes w/ Elastic - HaleyMoon, 8-1/2 Medium along with this Tiger Q. Both fit like a dream and are so so comfy. These shoes have just the right amount of "heel'. When I got this I wasn't sure if it was outdated or supposed to look the way it did, but I tried it anyways. I have been using for a couple weeks and have noticed that my hair above my lip has diminished some. I am hoping over time I will have to use this product less to see the same results. In my opinion this stuff should be used before bed or when you are just hanging out at home not expecting company. I say this because in my experience with this product, once I apply it my skin where applied is darker than where it isn't applied. Enough to make it look like I have a dirty face per say. I have used this on my top/upper lip area and have had the pleasure, or there lack of tasting this product after forgetting it was there. I do not recommend you try it, it's taste is awful. However since this isn't to be tasted or ingested - that factor doesn't matter regarding quality of product, just felt the need to share to beware to be careful when using. I am hoping that using this product will not only continue to help diminish the hair growth as a temporary but also I am in hopes that this helps keep the hair away at a more permanent level. I suppose in time I will know if this stuff has that ability. This comes in a extremely small container and a little goes a long way. Overall I am satisfied with the product, I only wish it were clear so you didn't notice it was on your skin when looking in the mirror.***I purchased this product at a discount for testing and review purposes, in exchange for my honest/unbiased opinion based on experience with mentioned product.***NOTE*** My body's reaction may differ from another persons bodily reactions while using product.(The date my reviews are posted on Amazon, may not reflect the actual real-time date that product was reviewed at home)

I have a love for essential oils because they have a great use for a lot of things. Tea tree oil is used for things such as: elimination of toe fungus, assist with cutting down foot odor, soothing sores, to soften dry cuticles, makeup remover, relive athletes foot, and so many more. I like to use my tea tree oil for a few things such as an anti-bacterial to help with acne, be sure to mix no more than 2-3 drops with about 20-40 drops of witch hazel. Also take care when using this method because although it is being used to assist in taking care of acne, or preventing all together it can also cause your skin to dry out and cause your skin to react in a way to produce more acne. So be sure to pay attention to your skin. If it is seeming dry, then lessen your use of this method to 2x a week rather than every day. You'll know how your body works best with any situation, as long as you pay attention. Also be careful when applying to face if you will be exposed to sun, as it can potentially make your skin sensitive to UV rays - so be sure to use a sunscreen! I also like to add it to my shampoo (2-3 drops) to assist with healing dandruff issues.*I purchased this product at a discount for testing and review purposes, in exchange for my honest/unbiased opinion based on experience with mentioned product.***NOTE*** My body's reaction may differ from another persons bodily reactions while using product.(The date my reviews are posted on Amazon, may not reflect the actual real-time date that product was reviewed at home)

I have had issues with getting a great nights sleep for almost 2 years now. I find myself waking a couple times in the middle of the night, for no apparent reason, leaving me feel tired and sore during the day following any given sleep cycle. In my experience after using this, I was actually pretty amazed at the sleep I was able to get.This product in my opinion can be taken during the day, and in my experience following the recommended dosing you can take up to 2x a day. On my first day of trying this, I had no responsibilities, no children, etc. So I followed the dosing recommendation. I say that because I was afraid with this being a sleep aid, that I may get drowsy if I took it during the day. I didn't know, it was my first time trying so I wanted to better of safe than sorry. I recommend anyone trying this product do the same process of elimination, due to everyone's body reacting different per product internally taken/ingested.After taking this product, 2x as recommended on the first day/night - I woke up in the morning when I was scheduled to. I didn't wake up in the middle of the night - and the funny thing is - I didn't even realize how great this product actually helped until that next afternoon when I went to take my day time dose. That is when I consciously said to myself "Oh my, I actually slept through the night", and then I took a moment to recognize that my body didn't feel as sore and unrested as it had in the past. It's funny how we generally only realize how our body feels when we are uncomfortable, rather than feeling great. Well that is how it is with me, and now when I take this product I am relieved to know I will sleep through the night, and wake feeling rested! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has insomnia issues, or issues with getting a good nights sleep. LOVE THIS STUFF!!!***I purchased this product at a discount for testing and review purposes, in exchange for my honest/unbiased opinion based on experience with mentioned product.***NOTE*** My body's reaction may differ from another persons bodily reactions while using product.(The date my reviews are posted on Amazon, may not reflect the actual real-time date that product was reviewed at home)

I just recently purchased a Smart LED TV, and noticed that most of the back connections are a lot different than that of an old fashioned TV. The Hdmi spaces were all new to me. I learned a little about it, and I'm always wanting more connector options for those just in case moments. In my experience with this 3 in 1 switch, it has made things easier for me in regards to when I need to connect something with Hdmi capabilities. You simply connect the main Hdmi chord to the OUT, and connect that to the TV, and then you can connect anything you want to send information from and into your TV to one of the 3 IN spots. In my opinion this makes things much less confusing for me and I can simply watch my TV, with these connected devices, without too much complication. This Hdmi switch does NOT come with hdmi chords, they must be purchased separately. I do recommend this item, for it's size which doesn't take up too much room, as well as it's capabilities of making things easier for hdmi, usage and control.***I purchased this product at a discounted price for testing and review purposes, in exchange for my honest/unbiased opinion based on my experience with the product.

This Orion Power Bank/Portable Charger arrived fully charged, which was great because I wanted to immediately put it to use, and my phone was in need of a charge. A few of the features on it that are rather pretty amazing are there are 4 lights to determine the charging capacity - If it is fully charged it will light up all 4 lights, 3 lights would be 3/4 way charged and so on. This is how you can determine when to remove from the usb charging port, and use as a charger. This also helps you determine how much battery life is left in it, while charging your device.The other feature that I find fascinating is you turn it on simply by a light touch and swipe across the arrows, in the direction of the arrows on the top. If it isn't plugged into a device for charging after powered on, it will automatically turn itself off. So far, so good. I received this product from the company in order for me to provide a review. I can so far say that, I have been only using it for about a week and am satisfied thus far. Awesome product for anyone who has an active fitness lifestyle or needs relief throughout the day. I use these sleeves as well as my knee supports when I go to the gym and I cannot even describe how amazing the combination of these items are. These markers are really, really fun to use. You not only get a great selection of bright and vibrant colors to get creative with, but it washes of easily. Over the 4th of July holidays I had my little cousins decorate non my windows and sliding glass balcony doors and it kept them nice and busy. Best part, I knew I could clean everything up with no effort (soap & water). I have fun using them myself for little artsy projects.Best used on Non Porous surfaces: Glass, White Boards, Chalkboards, Acrylics, etc.How to use:1. Point tip facing vertically and press against tip of your finger or other surface2. Shake with cap on in vertical position.3. Finally, press down on a piece of scrap paper until tip fills with ink.*I received this product from the company for review.

Surprisingly, I've never really heard of this supplement until now. When the company asked me to review their brand, I had to do a little research first since I'm against fat burner and diet pills. Much to my surprise, not only is it a naturally way to boost the metabolism, but a safe way to lose weight. Since I do have an active fitness lifestyle, I've managed to lose 3 pounds in 2 1/2 weeks. That may not sound amazing, but I've had difficulty shedding my last 5 vanity pounds for some months now. I just kind of plateaued despite all my efforts and healthy eating habits.I take the recommended dosage of 2 pills in the morning and 2 in the afternoon. Additionally, I drink allot of water throughout the day. I've had no jitters, body temperature changes or any of the other side effects caused by traditional weight loss products.BOTTLE: 60 Pills (5mg Fucoxanthin and 283mg of Proprietary blend)Scientific studies about this supplement is located here: http://examine.com/supplements/Fucoxanthin/

This is a very surprisingly well made set of must have essentials for any woman. I actually own a Bliss brand massage/cellulite mitt but even that one is not as skin friendly as these. The plastic on the devices are hard yet flexible enough not to cause skin bruising or scratches. Both are best used with creams and oil for optimal gliding over skin surface.The kit comes with instructions for both the mitt and roller making it easy for novices to grasp the use of the products. From my perspective, it's really a great value for the price. Additionally, I find the roller amazing to use on my shoulders and other sore areas post gym.*I received this item for review from the company.

First and foremost, I've given the product 4 stars only because I haven't totally gotten rid of my slight cellulite on my thigh area yet (they've definitely softened and become less noticeable). Even though I weight train and CrossFit, I still have problem areas like all other women. Exercise greatly reduces problem areas due to muscle building and strengthening and is required in order to really see results. Additionally, exercise helps in reducing fat cell size, stimulate circulation and removing toxins from the body which are the main culprits of cellulite. So, if you don't eat healthy and have a fitness regimen, you can't expect this product or any other to work. There are no magic potions!That being said, this product is fantastic. From first use, I noticed the skin on the areas applied (glutes and thighs) were super soft and really toned in texture. The product comes in a cream texture and white in color which is different than others I've tried which have typically been gels. The active ingredients are Retinol and Caffeine which are known to be great in fighting cellulite.Since it is a cream, it's best to massage your problem area with a cellulite brush/roller after bathing and then applying the cream. You apply it like regular lotion and it does dry very quickly. Not only that, there isn't a strong scent so you can use it anytime of the day or night. Some other products have such a strong smell that I can only use them at bedtime. So far so good.*I received this cellulite cream from the company for review purposes

*I received this product from the company for review.My mom actually took this item from me when my package came because of the ingredient list. So far, she's loved the product and states that she can feel the "tightening" or "toning" effect from first use. She's been consistently incorporating it in her regimen for 3 weeks now and has developed her own unique way of using it. First of all she doesn't have any wrinkles but there are some areas she was starting to worry about and has said she sees great improvement in said areas.My mom's Day time routine:1. She washed with a vitamin C or other skin firming cleanser.2. Uses her favorite toner with cotton pads.3. Applies Hyaluronic Acid serum and while skin is still damp, applies a nice thin layer of this product on face and neck.4. Let's air dry and then applies her makeup.Just like me, she has naturally oily skin, however she hasn't experienced any breakouts, pimples or clogged pores.

This mask is so moisturizing and is awesome as a once a week pampering treatment. It's a white, thick and creamy texture and a little goes a long way so don't be turned off by the size of the container. I've had 3 treatments so far and I've hardly made a dent in the product in the jar. You need to apply a semi-thick coating on your face (don't overdo it) cause slathering it won't make it work any better. I allow it to sit for 30 minutes in order to really penetrate my skin with all of it's active ingredients. I then wash off with lukewarm water. Once all the product is off, I make the water cold water to close my pores. While my skin is still damp I apply a Hyaluronic Acid serum followed by a moisturizer.The results are a brighter, moist face with decreased pore size and the results get better with each additional treatment.Even though I have naturally overly oily skin and this mask has not caused any breakouts, over-dryness or other symptoms. Additionally, I have not had any sinus issues such as sneezing or runny nose when using this product like I've had with some other masks.*I received this product for review from the company.

I know allot of people have a hard time with this cereal but there are others who are able to eat it without issue. I'm of the latter variety, however, I do have to make sure that I don't exceed 2 servings a day due to the chicory root ingredient. Because it's such a high fiber product, some may find themselves experiencing stomach issues such as bloating, gas and other such side effects. It could be that they're not accustomed to a high-fiber diet or are just allergic to chicory root itself. This cereal is really delicious, filling and crunchy. Plus it alleviates a late night sweet tooth with ease.CHICORY ROOT FACTS: Chicory may provide direct functional support to the digestive reactions in the body. First of all, chicory root increases the flow of bile, which supports digestion. Because extra bile helps break down fats, chicory root may help optimize blood composition and is worth consideration by anyone seeking to achieve optimal liver and gallbladder health.Secondly, organic chicory root contains inulin, a soluble fiber that feeds digestive flora in the intestines. Many plants contain inulin, but chicory root has the highest concentration. Nourishing the healthy flora in the intestines enhances digestion. Furthermore, since inulin content is not digestible, the lack of glucose can help promote optimal blood sugar levels while also increasing stool bulk and consistency to help eliminate toxins efficiently.

I have used a few Veranda Patio furniture covers for my patio furniture which have been working great The Classic Accessories Veranda Round Patio Table & Chair Set Cover comes with heavy duty water-proof materials which fits nicely with my round patio table. It looks stylish with its two-color tone with straps to secure the cover in place from heavy winds.  There is a zippered opening in the middle for fitting the umbrella. You could also remove the umbrella entirely and there is a flap to cover the umbrella hole as well.The one I received was the medium size which covers patio furniture up to 70" in diameter. My table is 60" in diameter but not including the chairs Make sure you measure the actual size with patio chairs to pick the proper cover size.Overall, I would recommend this cover as it provides a nice durable and stylish protection for our patio furniture.

The Cuisinart CIT-100 Silicone Tipped Locking Grill tongs works nicely for BBQ cooking. The length is good and it is easy for grabbing and flipping the meats with its silicon covered handle and tips. It also works well for general cooking tasks and baking. Another nice thing is that the silicon tip can also be detached for cleaning. However, the silicon tip would not be able to withstand high heat such as frying.Overall, these grill tongs in general works better than my other cheaper brand tongs. Recommended

I have been using several different brands of Power Line adapters for my rooms located far away from my DSL modem. The performances of these  adapters have been mixed with occasional problems including power line interference and dropped connections. The TRENDnet Power Line 1200 AV2 Adapter gave a pleasant surprise when I tried it out on my existing network. I was able to get it up and running within a few minutes by plugging one near the DSL modem and the another in my remote room. No setup, drivers, or software installation required. And it does not conflict with my other brand of power line adapters on the same electrical network.The next thing I did was to install the Power Packet Utility software which came with the product package. This utility allows us see the status, quality, and speed of the connected network. The quality registered was pretty good . However the speed registered about 120 Mbps, which was a bit lower than I expected. I also ran a speed test through the DSLreports site. The download speed was also a bit slower than my other range extender client router located in the same room. I would be expecting this power line adapter's speed to surpass that of the range extender setup. This could also attribute to the the electrical connection.Overall, I like this Power Line adapter as it is very easy to install, does not conflict with my other power line adapters,  and provides a stable connection to my remote room location.

I have been a long time user of a variety of dark circle / puffy eye cream products to fight my persistent dark circles. The fact is that there is no perfect cream or lotion that would completely eliminate the problems without proper diet and sleep care. I tried the L'Oreal Paris Skin Care Age for 3-weeks by following the directions strictly without using my other eye cream products in order to provide a fare assessment. The eye cream has a smooth texture resembling those eye concealers. It adheres to the skin quite well for an effective application. After 3 weeks of continual use, I notice some slight improvements for my puffy eyes and dark circles. The product comes in 0.5 oz which should last for 1-2 months with twice daily applications,Overall, I would recommend this product as I like its creamy and rich texture which provides a nice feel and comfort.

I have been using various models of the Canon Pixma printers and quite pleased with its print quality and reliability. The Canon MG6820 Wireless All-In-One Printer comes with a setup CD, sample 4"x 6" photo paper, and the standard ink tanks. It is quite to set up and connected to my home Wi-Fi network without any problems.  Document and photo printing are pretty fast but probably more on the average side as compared to my other wireless printers. I also tried printing some document  from my Android tablet with the Canon print App without any hick-ups.The printer comes with a touch-screen 3" LCD display panel which is quite easy to navigate various controls. There is no USB interface on the unit and it does not come with USB cable . The scanning function works quite well with a 1200 x 2400 DPI maximum resolution. However, the unit is lack of the Fax function which is often found in other all-in-one printers. Photo printing quality is quite good as expected.Overall, this is a nice printer to have if the missing Fax function is not essential.

I am not a big pretzel fan but these Snack Factory Pretzel Crisps are making me and my wife falling in love with them. These crispy and thin chips have zero fat and cholesterol contents which would make a nice substitute for the less healthier snacks. They can also be dipped into our favorite toppings which makes them particularly enticing. And they are becoming part of our favorite daily snacks.These healthy and tasty Pretzel chips would make great snacks for the parties and at home.

I have been using the Corel PaintShop Pro software since its earliest version and it is still the main photo-editing software I use everyday among other photo-editing software including the PhotoShop. What I like about the Corel PaintShop Pro software are its ease of use and the wealth of features for general quick /easy and the more advanced photo editing.Here are some of the features I use most often for quick editing :- smart photo fix : allows a 1-click photo enhancement with real time review and adjustment to our liking- various photo brushes (clone brush, scratch remover etc) for quick touch-up of the photos- white balance adjustment for the perfect color balancing- skin smoothing which makes us look years youngerThe software comes with a wealth of advanced features including layering, masking, vector objects, stack filters, raw processing and a variety of photo effects.This latest version is noticeably faster including the program start-up and the more CPU intensive tasks like skin smoothing and such. It also comes with new features such as magic move which allows us to move an object with an intelligent algorithm to fill the background. There are also bonus CDs including the Perfect Effects, Corel AfterShot, Perfectly Clear SE, and creative collection which enhance our capabilities for photo editing.For those who are looking a reasonably priced photo editing software with easy-to-use interface and advanced features, this is one to consider.

The Alfa Long-Range Dual-Band AC1200 Wireless USB adapter installed and ran OK initially on my Windows 10 PC. I was able to get pretty decent download speed in a remote location of my house. However, after using it for 1 week, the unit started to have connection issues and dropped connection every 10 - 15 minutes. I tried to connect it to router's Wifi and the problem continued to persist.  Searching on the manufacturer's website for the latest set of driver with no luck neither. All I found was a huge zip file with no specific instructions on which driver to choose.I would not recommend buying this product

I have used a lot of TP-Link products which have been working quite well. The TP-LINK TL-WN725N Wireless N Nano USB Adapter is a big disappointment as my Windows 8.1 kept crashing with a unrecoverable hardware error message as soon as I plugged this adapter in the USB slot. I tried to install the driver first before plugging in the Nano Adapter and it still failed the same way. Sadly I am returning this.

I am an experienced drone hobbyist who have built and flown many different model of drones from toy grades to the more advanced ones. The Air Hogs Altitude video drone certainly belongs to the toy grade copter category. At its price range, it comes with attractive features such as video cam including built-in memory with an micro USB interface for charging and uploading the videos.However, it was a disappointment on the design of this copter. It is very difficult to control and cannot maintain stable hovering in flights. It can also only operates indoor. For some reason, as soon as I take it outdoor just a few feet away from the entrance, the copter would not respond to the controls. The internal memory is about 118 Mbytes which could hardly store any meaningful video clips.As much as I like its appearance, I could not recommend this copter.

The Charcoal Companion Flame Friendly Indoor/Outdoor Grill/Bake Pan comes in the right size (measures 8"W x 11"L x 1.5"H) which fits well on the BBQ grill top and oven.  This is better than my other 20" x 11" cast iron griddle which was much heavier and harder to clean. The bottom of this grill / pan pan is coated with ceramic which is flame resistant and conducts heats well. I used the pan to grill vegetables and Korean spicy pork on my BBQ grill. They all turned out perfect and juicy. The pan is also easy to clean and is dishwasher safe.Highly recommended as a BBQ / baking companion utensil.

I have used different brands and types of Wi-Fi range extenders for my home including some older models Linksys Wi-Fi range extender. The Linksys AC1200 Wi-Fi extender is very easy to set up by connecting to the device via WiFi and running the configuration utility. It extends the range of both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz signals with nice signal boosting to a remote room in my house. It also supports easy WPS connectivity for better security.I tested the range extender with a table and a PC. On the tablet, I ran the Android Wifi Analyzer app and a speed tester from a remote location with the extender located half-way in between. The WiFi analyzer registered a 10% - 15% increase in signal strength. I also see significant improvements in the download speed test.The second test I did was on a desktop PC connected to a long-range Wifi antenna. I did not see any significant improvements on the signal strength and data transfer rate by comparing it against the original signal from the router and the extender.In my opinion, the Linksys AC1200 extender would work nicely for mobile devices such as tablets and phone using WiFi connections.

The Reynolds Wrap Extra Heavy Duty Foil pack comes with four 10" x 15.5" thick aluminium foils which fits well for cooking steaks, pork chops, chicken, and veggies on the BBQ grill and oven. All we need to do is to place the marinated meat inside the pocket, seal it and let the grill / oven does the job. The food comes out juicy and tender with the heat perfectly trapped inside . These works quite a better than using regular aluminium foils as they are not as well sealed as the Reynolds Wrap .Highly recommended

I am a Hershey's chocolate lover. The Hershey's Assortment Candy Box comes with my favorite Hershey's candies assortment in miniature size in an easy to dispense box. The packages are well sealed and I saw no damages with the wrapping and candies through shipping. These assortment would certainly provide a great treat to the chocolate lovers in the office area or parties.

The Tic Tac Mixers, Peach Lemonad comes with an interesting mix of flavors. A bit on the sweet side from the peach and mixed with a sour lemonade flavor. Couldn't resist and consumed a pack in 15 minutes. This makes a nice addition to my Tic Tac candies.

The Hefty College Cups comes with an attractive design with quality materials. The 18 oz size is perfect for serving beverages and drinks in tail-gating parties and alike. Unlike those cheaper made plastic cups, the Hefty College Cups could be re-used several times and are fully recyclable. I just hope that they produce more different varieties including my favorite colleges .

I purchased the ROBO 3D R1 Plus printer from a local electronics store. Spent a couple of days including hours of interaction with the Robo 3D support before I was able to get the printer properly calibrated and running. Here is a summary of my experience and impression of this budget 3D printer.Overall appearance and packaging- the printer comes in a nice attractive box packed in heavy foam materials. The package includes a tool box with the necessary tools for doing our own maintenance and lubrication. It also comes with a glue stick for the heatbed and a sample 300g spool of PLA filament. This is nice as this would get us going without having to buy the parts and materials.- what surprised me a bit was that the movable parts (x-axis and z-axis motors assemblies) were not well secured by taping materials to avoid shipping damages. For my other color laser printers which have similar weight and sizes as the Robo 3D printer, they came with all the movable parts secured by tapes with clear instructions on removing and unpacking them. To no surprises, I found that the Z-end stop brackets were popped out. A couple of wiring connectors and a 5-pin motor control connector all came loose probably due to shipping and handling. I had to contact Robo3D support and receive a video instruction on putting the Z-end stop brackets back into its place.Installation and software- The printers comes with a third-party software (MatterControl) on a SD card. Installation was pretty straight-forward. It also comes with a video instructions on assembling the printer.- The software comes with a load of features for controlling the printer quality, materials, and tuning / calibration. It also comes with a library of 26 ready to be printed 3D-models. The software shows the approximate print duration based on the materials, quality and complexity of the model. However, it does not show the remaining print time which could be very useful for monitoring the print status,- Once the print job begins, it would preheat the extruder and bed temperature before the actual printing starts. We can also pause or cancel the job anytime via the control panel.Operation- I started with printing the calibration circle model. To my dismay, the printer head's z-axis position was way high up from the heatbed and the printing turned out a messed up pile of dispensed filament. After searching on the web and support web site, I figured that the problem probably had to do with the Z-axis calibration. I also found that the wire connectors to the motors assemblies were not well secured and came loose quite easily- Fortunately Robo 3D had a nice support structure which allows us to book a 45 minutes appointment with a technician. The support personnel turned out to be quite knowledgeable and walked me through the calibration process over the phone. After the calibration, I was able to print the calibration circle perfectly.
